text.body:
﻿
tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ |
kṣobhasphuritacūḍendukhaṇḍaprakaravibhramāḥ |
tāṇḍavāḍambare śambhoraṭṭahāsāḥ punantu vaḥ || 1 ||
vivicyamānagambhīramūlagranthākulānprati |
ito 'pyataḥ paraṃ vyākhyā saṃkṣepeṇa nigadyate || 2 ||
kramaprāptārthālaṃkāralakṣaṇāya tṛtīyaparicchedārambhaḥ | tatra vibhāgopayuktaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamāha—
alamarthamalaṃkartuṃ yavdyutpattyādivartmanā |
jñeyā jātyādayaḥ prājñaiste 'rthālaṃkārasaṃjñayā || 1 ||
alamarthamiti | viśiṣṭā utpattirvyutpattirjāteravacchedakaḥ prakāraḥ | ādiśabdādvividhaśaktipratibandhādayo vibhāvanādyavacchedāstrayoviṃśatiḥ | arthālaṃkārasaṃjñayeti | arthaśobhānivṛttiheturvicchittirarthālaṃkāra iti sphuṭalakṣaṇam ||
jātirvibhāvanā heturahetuḥ sūkṣmamuttaram |
virodhaḥ saṃbhavo 'nyonyaṃ parivṛttirnidarśanā || 2 ||
vibhāgāndarśayati—jātiriti ||
bhedaḥ samāhitaṃ bhrāntirvitarko mīlitaṃ smṛtiḥ |
bhāvaḥ pratyakṣapūrvāṇi pramāṇāni ca jaimineḥ || 3 ||
pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdārthāpattyabhāvākhyāni jaimineḥ pramāṇāni ṣaṭ | tenaiva krameṇa lakṣaṇānyākhyātuṃ pratyakṣapūrvāṇītyuktam | sāhityasya sarvapariṣadyatvannānā- darśanarītyupajīvanamucitameva || ﻿
nāstyevāsavarthālaṃkāro yaḥ svarūpaṃ nāśrayata iti prāthamyaṃ jāterevetyāha—
teṣu—
nānāvasthāsu jāyante yāni rūpāṇi vastunaḥ |
svebhyaḥ svebhyo nisargebhyastāni jātiṃ pracakṣate || 4 ||
teṣviti | kālakṛto viśeṣo 'vasthā | tāmadhikṛtya jāyante vastusvarūpavyabhicāriṇyutpadyante | nanvevaṃ ‘ya ete yajjvānaḥ prathitamahaso ye 'pyavanipā mṛgākṣyo yāścaitāḥ kṛtamaparasaṃsārakathayā | aho ye cāpyanye phalakusumanamrā viṭapino jagatyevaṃrūpā vilasati mṛdeṣā bhagavatī ||’ ityādāvapi jātitvaṃ syādityata āha—svebhyaḥ svebhya iti | svabhāvabhūtānītyarthaḥ | kavipratibhāmātraprakāśanīyarūpoṭṭaṅkanaṃ jātiriti lakṣaṇam | laukikavikalpaviṣayo 'pi pratibhayā bhāsata eva | yadāha— ‘rasānuguṇaśabdārthacintāstimicacetasaḥ | kṣaṇaṃ viśeṣasparśotthā prajñaiva pratibhā kaveḥ | sa hi cakṣurbhagavatastṛtīyamiti gīyate | yena sākṣātkarotyeṣa bhāvāṃstrailokyavartinaḥ ||’ iti ||
uktameva viśeṣamabhisaṃdhāyāha—
arthavyakteriyaṃ bhedamiyatā pratipadyate |
jāyamānapriyaṃ vakti rūpaṃ sā sārvakālikam || 5 ||
arthavyakteriti | vastusvarūpollekhanarūpārthavyaktirarthaguṇeṣūktā | tatra sārvakālikaṃ rūpamupajanāpāyāntarālavyāpakamityarthaḥ | atra tu jāyamānamāgantunimittaṃ samavadhānaprabhavaṃ vyabhicaritamityarthaḥ | vicchittiprakārayorasaṃkarātpṛthaka‍śobhārpaṇācca yukto vyatirekastena svabhāvoktirevārthavyaktiriti yatkenaciduktaṃ tadapāstam | ata eva jātyantaraprakārāṇāmapi pṛthagalaṃkāratā syāditi na yuktamavāntaravacasaiva vyāghātāt | na hi sāmānyaviśeṣayorvibhāgo bhavati ||
svarūpamāśrayo heturiti tadbhedahetavaḥ |
te saṃsthānādayasteṣu sā viśeṣeṇa śobhate || 6 ||
svarūpamiti | āśrayaviśeṣahetuviśeṣavyatirikto 'vacchedakaprakāraḥ svarūpam | etadeva vibhajate—te saṃsthānādaya iti | nanu kimanena prapañcena pūrvābhihi- ﻿
tarūpamātrasyaiva jātitvādityata āha—teṣu seti | viśeṣeṇa śobhāhetureva hyalaṃkāraḥ | asti cātra tathābhāva iti bhāvaḥ ||
tatra svarūpaṃ dvidhā | śarīrāvayavasaṃniveśalakṣaṇamatādṛśaṃ ca | ādyamapi buddhi- kāritamatathābhūtaṃ ca | tadetadāha—
tatra svarupaṃ saṃsthānamavasthānaṃ tathaiva ca |
veṣo vyāpāra ityādyaiḥprabhedairbahudhā sthitam || 7 ||
tatra svarūpamiti | ādipadena vṛkṣādisvarūpaparigrahaḥ ||
mugdhāṅganārbhakastiryaṅgīcapātrāṇi cāśrayaḥ |
deśaḥ kālaśca śaktiśca sādhanāni ca hetavaḥ || 8 ||
śaktiḥ padārthānāṃ sāmarthyam | sādhanāni kartrādīni ṣaṭ ||
teṣu saṃsthānaṃ yathā—
‘sa dakṣiṇāpāṅganiviṣṭamuṣṭiṃ natāṃsamākuñcitasavyapādam |
dadarśa cakrīkṛtacārucāpaṃ prahartumabhyudyatamātyayonim || 1 ||’
atra dhanurdhareṇaivamaṅgāni samyagbuddhipūrvakaṃ sthāpanīyānīti saṃsthānamidaṃ jātibhedaḥ ||
atra dhanurdhareṇeti | taduktam—‘apāṅge dakṣiṇāṃ muṣṭiṃ vāmāṃ vinyasya mastake | pādamākuñcayedvāmaṃ lakṣye niścalalocanaḥ ||’ iti | atra sarvasyaiva dhanurdharasyaivaṃvidhaśarīrāvayavasaṃniveśo bhavati na kāmasyaiveti nāśrayaviśeṣo vivakṣitaḥ | evamuttaratrāpi ||
avasthānabhedena yathā—
‘pādāvaṣṭambhanamrīkṛtamahiṣatanorullasadbāhumūlaṃ śūlaṃ prollāsayantyāḥ saralitavapuṣo madhyabhāgasya devyāḥ |
viśliṣṭaspaṣṭadṛṣṭonnativiralavalivyaktagaurāntarālā- stistro vaḥ pāntu lekhāḥ kramavaśavikasatkañcukaprāntamuktāḥ || 2 ||’
﻿
atra striyāḥ śūlaprollāsanādau vyāpāre buddhikāritamapi śarīrāvasthānamīdṛśaṃ jāyata itīdamavasthānaṃ nāma jātibhedaḥ ||
pādāvaṣṭambheti | ullasadbāhumūlamiti prollasanakriyāviśeṣaṇam | saralitavapuṣa iti madhyabhāgaviśeṣaṇam | ata eva valīnāṃ viśleṣo mitho vibhāgaḥ upariśarīrākarṣaṇātkañcukaprāntāpasaraṇam | musalollāsanādau dṛṣṭamidamabuddhijameva nārīṇāṃ rūpamiti bhagavatīviṣaye pratibimbanamatisphuṭameva | tadāha—ādāviti ||
veṣo yathā—
‘chaṇapiṭṭhadhūsaratthaṇi mahumaaambacchi kuvalaāharaṇe |
‘kassa kaa cūamañjari putti tue maṇḍio gāmo || 3 ||
[kṣaṇapiṣṭadhūsarastani madhumadatāmrākṣi kuvalayābharaṇe |
kasyakṛte cūtamañjari putri tvayā maṇḍito grāmaḥ ||]
atra vasantotsave grāmataruṇīnāmayaṃ veṣo janamanaḥpramodāya jāyata iti veṣo nāmāyaṃ jātibhedaḥ ||
atra vasantotsava iti | yadyapyatra kālaḥ pātraṃ cāsti tathāpi ‘saṃvāllaṇamaülijhavivaraürāhaïambiraïaüṇa tālaṅkam | siṭilāantaṃ savaṇā arambhisāreha ekkāvi ||’ ityādau na saṃkaraḥ kādācitkastvasau guṇa eva veṣasya kathaṃ rañjakatetyavaśiṣyate | tatrāha—janamanaḥpramodāyeti | rucyarthitvamutpattīnāṃ pratipakṣagatānāmakṣuṇṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ ||
vyāpāro yathā—
‘agre gatena vasatiṃ parigṛhya ramyā- māpātya sainikanirākaraṇākulena |
yānto 'nyataḥ plutakṛtasvaramāśu dūrā- dudbāhunā juhuvire muhurātmavargyāḥ || 4 ||’
atra tādṛśi vyāpāre vyāpṛtānāmīdṛśameva svarūpaṃ jāyata iti vyāpāranāmāyaṃ jātibhedaḥ || ﻿
āśrayeṣu mugdhayuvatiryathā—
‘sahiāhi bhammamāṇā thaṇae laggaṃ kusumbhapupphaṃ ti |
muddhavahuā hasijjaï papphoḍantī ṇahavaāim || 5 ||’
[sakhībhirmaṇyamānā stanayorlagnaṃ kusumbhapuṣpaṃ te |
mugdhavadhūrhasyate proñchantī nakhavraṇāni ||]
atra mugdhavadhvāśritakriyāsvarūpabhaṇanādiyaṃ mugdhāṅganāśritā jātiḥ ||
arbhakāśritā yathā—
‘ākrośannāhvayannanyānādhāvanmaṇḍalaṃ rudan |
gāḥ kālayati daṇḍena ḍimbhaḥ sasyāvatāriṇīḥ || 6 ||’
atrārbhakāśritavyāpārasvarūpokteriyamarbhakāśritā jātiḥ ||
agre gateneti | atrodbāhuneti yadyapyavasthānamasti tathāpi tatparihāreṇodāharaṇabhasaṃkīrṇam | ‘sahiāhi bhammamāṇā thaṇae laggaṃ kusumbhapupphaṃ ti | muddhavahuā hasijjaï papphoḍantī ṇahavaāham ||’ ityatraikasyāḥ kadācidvitarkāyedamapi vākyaṃ bahūnāṃ tu neti bahuvacanasvarasaḥ | kusumbhakesarāṇyuccetuṃ vāraṃvāramasau kṣetraṃ praviśatīti saṃbhāvanā | mugdhā apariśīlitābhimānikasukhā vadhūḥ prathamapariṇītā | prasphoṭyamānāmapi tvayā nāpasaratītyaho tava saukumāryamiti cāṭugarbhaṃ hasitam | ata eva priyatamā tasyānubandho vartamānanirdeśena vyajyate | evadagrimodāharaṇavyākhyāne kriyāvyāpāragrahaṇamupalakṣaṇato na vyāpārasaṃkaraḥ | anye tvāhuḥ āśrayāvacchedena bahirbhāvo 'tra bhedaheturiti ||
tiryagāśrayā yathā—
‘līḍhavyastavipāṇḍurāgranakhayorākarṇadīrṇaṃ mukhaṃ vinyasyāgrimayoryuge caraṇayoḥ sadyo vibhinnadvipaḥ |
etasminmadagandhavāsitavaṭaḥ sāvajñatiryagvala- tsṛkkāntāhatidhūtalolamadhupaḥ kuñjeṣu śete hariḥ || 7 ||’
atra siṃhasvarūpabhaṇanādiyaṃ tiryagāśrayā jātiḥ || ﻿
lị̄dheti | vyastaṃ vigatarudhiram | sāvajñaṃ tiryak valantī ye sṛkkiṇī tābhyāmāhatā iti saṃbandhaḥ | yathaikatra kuñje svapataḥ svarūpaṃ tathānyatrāpīti bahuvacanarahasyam | ata eva na deśahetuśaṅa‍kā | atra siṃheti | madavāsanayā viśeṣitatvāditi bhāvaḥ ||
nīcāśrayā yathā—
‘bhadraṃ te sadṛśaṃ yadadhvagaśataiḥ kīrtistavoddhuṣyate sthāne rūpamanuttamaṃ sukṛtinā dānena karṇo jitaḥ |
ityālocya ciraṃ dṛśā karuṇayā śītātureṇa stutaḥ pānthenaikapalālamuṣṭirucinā garvāyate hālikaḥ || 8 ||’
atra hīnapātrahālikasvarūpoktirīyaṃ nīcāśrayā jātiḥ ||
bhadraṃ ta iti | karuṇākārpaṇyavyañjakaviśeṣaśālinī | garvāyate agarvavāneva garvavānbhavati | bhṛśādau lakṣatvādermatvarthalakṣaṇatvāt ||
atha hetavaḥ | teṣu deśo yathā—
‘imāstā vindhyādreḥ śukaharitavaṃśīvanaghanā bhuvaḥ krīḍāloladviradaradanārugṇaravaḥ |
latākuñje yāsāmupanādi rataklāntaśabarī- kapolasvedāmbhaḥ paricayanudo vānti marutaḥ || 9 ||’
atra vindhyādrerīdṛśeṣu pradeśeṣvitthaṃbhūtā vāyavo vāntīti hetutvenoktatvāddeśasya deśaheturjātiriyam ||
imāstā iti | deśaviśeṣamuddiś‍ya marutāṃ vidhānamuddeś‍yasya ca vidhau hetubhāvaḥ | vaṃśīvanānāṃ duṣpraveśatayā marutāṃ mandībhāvo dviradaistarubhaṅa‍gādavakāśalābhe pragalbha- tvamataḥ klamasvedāpanayanasāmarthyametatsarvamāha—atra vindhyādreriti ||
kālaheturyathā—
‘kampante kapayo bhṛśaṃ jalakṛśaṃ gojāvikaṃ glāyati śvā cullīkuharodaraṃ kṣaṇamapi kṣipto 'pi naivojjhati |
﻿
śītārtivyasanāturaḥ punarayaṃ dīno janaḥ kūrmava- tsvānyaṅa‍gāni śarīra eva hi nije nihnotumākāṅkṣati || 10 ||’
atra hemantahetukatiryagādyaśrayavyāpārasvarūpokteriyaṃ kālaheturnāma jātiḥ ||
gojāvikamiti | ‘vibhāṣāvṛkṣamṛga 2|4|12’ ityādinā pākṣika ekavadbhāvaḥ | atra hemanteti | yadyapi tiryagāśrayeyaṃ jātiḥ tathāpi hetoradhikasya praveśātpṛthagbhāvaḥ | saṃkarastu na duṣyati ||
śaktiryathā—
‘badhnannaṅa‍geṣu romāñcaṃ kurvanmanasi nirvṛtim |
netre nimīlayanneṣa priyāsparśaḥ pravartate || 11 ||’
atra romāñcabandhādiṣu priyāsparśapravṛtternimittasyoktatvādiyaṃ śaktiheturnāma jātiḥ ||
romāñcabandhādiṣviti | badhnannityādau śatṛpratyayena kartābhidhīyate | sa ca sāmānādhikaraṇyātsparśa eva | sparśatvāviśeṣe tu śaktireva prayojikā vācyetyarthaḥ ||
sādhanaheturyathā—
‘upanihitahalīśāsārgaladvāramārā- tparicakitapurandhrīsāritābhyarṇabhāṇḍam |
pavanarayatiraścīrvāridhārāḥ pratīccha- nviśati valitaśṛṅa‍gaḥ pāmarāgāramukṣā || 12 ||’
atra jāyamānakriyāhetubhūtayoḥ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ sādhanayoḥ svarūpavarṇanādayaṃ sādhanaheturnāma jātibhedaḥ ||
upanihiteti | agāradvārasya halīśāvaruddhatayā duṣpraveśatvamata eva bahiściraṃ vilambāt pratyeṣaṇaveśanayorvartamānatā | upalakṣaṇaṃ cedam | tena karaṇādayo 'pyudāhāryāḥ ||
pakṣe svabhāvaparyavasānamastīti jāteḥ kiṃcidapakṛṣṭāṃ vibhāvanāṃ vibhāvayitumāha—
﻿
prasiddhahetuvyāvṛttyā yatkiṃcitkāraṇāntaram |
yatra svābhāvikaṃ vāpi vibhāvyaṃ sā vibhāvanā || 9 ||
śuddhā citrā vicitrā ca vividhā sā nigadyate |
śuddhā yatraikamuddiś‍ya hetureko nivartate || 10 ||
prasiddheti | prasiddhasparśahetorvibhāvyatayā prasiddhagrahaṇaṃ niyamena tadbhāvāpattimūlatvaṃ cāsyāstena virodhaḥ | tathā hi ‘ṇamaha avaṭṭhiatuṅa‍ga—’ ityādau vardhanajanyamanyadeva tuṅa‍gatvamanyacca pārameśvaramājānikamiti tayorabhedādhyavasāyaḥ | eta- devābhisaṃdhāya kāś‍mīrakairatiśayoktirasyā mūlamuktā | yaditi nipāto yatrārthe | yadyapi kāraṇābhāve 'pi kāryotpattirityeva lakṣaṇaṃ tathāpi mahāsaṃjñākaraṇaprayojanaṃ kimityāśaṅa‍kāyāṃ dvayaṃ vibhāvyamāha | tadayamatra saṃkṣepaḥ—yathoktā tāvadvibhāvanā | sā dvayī | kāraṇāntaraparyavasitā, svabhāvaparyavasitā ceti ||
pratyekaṃ ca śuddhādibhedātṣọdhā saṃpadyata ityetāvataiva vibhāvanā śarīraniṣpatteḥ | yathā varṇo varṇena karambitaṃ citraṃ tathā vibhāvanāpi vibhāvanayā tādṛśī citretyāha—
aneko yatra sā citrā vicitrā yatra tāṃ prati |
tayānyayā vā gīrbhaṅa‍gyā viśeṣaḥ kaściducyate || 11 ||
aneka iti | yathā ca svarūpasaṃpādakātiriktaviśeṣapraveśādvicitrāḥ sragdāmādayastatheyamapīti darśayati—vicitrā yatreti | tāṃ vibhāvanām | tayā vibhāvanayā | anyayeti alaṃkārāntararūpayā ||
tatra kāraṇāntaravibhāvanāyāṃ śuddhā yathā—
‘apītakṣībakādambamasaṃsṛṣṭāmalāmbaram |
aprasāditasūkṣmāmbu jagadāsīnmanoharam || 13 ||’
atraikaikaṃ kādambādikamuddiś‍ya kṣībatādeḥ pītatvādirekaikaḥ prasiddhaheturvyāvartate | hetvantaraṃ ca śaratprabhāvo vibhāvyate | seyaṃ śuddhā nāma kāraṇavibhāvanāyāṃ bibhāvanā ||
pītaṃ pānam | sūkṣmaṃ nirmalam | śaratprabhāva iti | prastāvaucitībhyāmabhivyaktaḥ ||
﻿
svābhāvikatvavibhāvanāyāṃ śuddhā yathā—
‘anañjitāsitā dṛṣṭirbhrūranāvarjitā natā |
arañjitāruṇaścāyamadharastava sundari || 14 ||’
atraikaikaṃ dṛṣṭyādikamuddiś‍yāsitatvāderanañjitatvādirekaiko heturvyā vartyate | svābhāvikatvaṃ cāsitatvādi dṛṣṭyādervibhāvyate | seyaṃ śuddhā nāma svābhāvikavibhāvanāyāṃ vibhāvanā ||
kāraṇāntaravibhāvanāyāṃ citrā yathā—
‘asaṃbhṛtaṃ maṇḍanamaṅa‍gyaṣṭeranāsavākhyaṃ karaṇaṃ madasya |
kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyātparaṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede 15’
atraikameva vayolakṣaṇaṃ padārthamuddiś‍yāpyaneko maṇḍanādeḥ prasiddho hetuḥ saṃbhṛtatvādirvyāvartyate | kāraṇāntaraṃ ca stanodbhedadhātūpacayalāvaṇyalakṣmīlābhādirvibhāvyate | seyaṃ citrā nāma kāraṇāntaravibhāvanā ||
asaṃbhṛtamiti | nanu maṇḍanasya saṃbharaṇapūrvakatayā prasiddherastu vibhāvanā | ‘anāsavākhyaṃ karaṇaṃ madasya kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastram’ ityatra tu katham | tathāhi | karaṇamiti karaṇe vā lyuṭra | ādye madasya karaṇamāsavo vayastu tato bhinnamiti kadācivdyatirekaḥ syānnatu vibhāvanā | dvitīye 'pi vayo madasya kriyā āsavanāmnī na bhavatīti na saṃgatam | evaṃ puṣpavyatiriktamastramityatrāpi vikalpya yathāyathaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ vācyam | tatkathametat | ucyate | karaṇaṃ kriyā āsavamākhyātītyāsavākhyam | stryākhyavatpratyayavidhiḥ | na tathābhūtamanāsavākhyam | hetutayā na kvacidāsavabodhakṣamam | tathā hetupratiṣedha eva bhaṅa‍gyā darśito bhavati | astramapi kriyārūpaṃ tatpuṣpavyatiriktaṃ puṣpacyutaṃ vinā puṣpebhya iti pūrvavadunneyam | stanodbhedetyādau nārthasaṃdehaḥ ||
saiva svābhāvikatvavibhāvanāyāṃ yathā—
‘ṇamaha avaṭṭhiatuṅa‌‍gaṃ avisāria visyaaaṇoṇaaaṃ gahiram |
appalahuaparisaṇhaṃ aṇṇāaparamatthapāaṃḍa mahumahaṇam || 16 ||’
[namata avasthitatuṅa‍gamavisāritāvistṛtamanavanatagabhīram |
apralaghumapariślakṣṇamajñātaparamārthapāradaṃ madhumathanam ||]
﻿
atraikameva madhumathanamuddiś‍yānekastuṅa‍gatvādeḥ pravṛddhatvādiḥ prasiddho heturvyāvartyate | svābhāvikatvaṃ ca taṃ pratyeṣāṃ vibhāvyate | seyaṃ citrā nāma svābhāvikatvavibhāvanāyāṃ vibhāvanā ||
tathaiva gīrbhaṅa‍gyā vicitrā yathā—
‘vakraṃ nisargasurabhi vapuravyājasundaram |
akāraṇaripustasyā nirnimittaṃ suhṛcca me || 17 ||’
atrottarayorvirahasamāgamādikāraṇāntaravibhāvanayoḥ svābhāvikībhyāṃ prāgvibhāvanābhyāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ viśeṣa uktaṃ | seyaṃ vibhāvanayaiva vibhāvanāyāṃ viśeṣoktestayaiva gīrbhaṅa‍gyā vicitrā nāma vibhāvanā bhavati ||
vakraṃ nisargasurabhīti | tasyā yathokte vakravapuṣī mamākāraṇaripurnirnimittaṃ suhṛccetyanvayo vivakṣitapratītilābhācca nārthāntaraikavācakatvalakṣaṇo doṣaḥ | yathāsaṃkhyamiti | tayorapyekaikaṃ prati saṃpādanalakṣaṇaviśeṣārpaṇakṣamatvāt ||
saivānyayā gīrbhaṅa‍gyā yathā—
‘vanecarāṇāṃ vanitāsakhānāṃ darīgṛhotsaṅa‍ganiṣaktabhāsaḥ |
bhavanti yatrauṣadhayo rajanyāmatailapūrāḥ suratapradīpāḥ || 18 ||’
atrātailapūrāḥ suratapradīpā iti svābhāvikatvavibhāvanāyāṃ śeṣapadārthairavibhāvanārūpairviśeṣa uktaḥ | seyamanyayā gīrbhaṅa‍gyā vicitrā nāma vibhāvanā bhavati ||
śeṣapadārthairiti | vanitāsakhatvādibhiḥ suratādyupapādakaiḥ ||
kriyāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ hetuḥ kārato jñāpakaśca saḥ |
abhāvaścitrahetuśca caturvidha iheṣyate || 12 ||
hetupratiṣedho vibhāvanāyāmuktaḥ, atha hetureva ka ityapekṣāyāṃ hetulakṣaṇamāha—kriyāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ heturiti | upapattau kriyāyāmeva sarvasya nimittabhāvo nirūpyata ityabhisaṃdhāya kriyāyā ityuktamiti kaścit | tadasat | dravyaguṇakriyā-﻿
viṣaye hetuḥ kriyāmātraviṣayaśca kārakamiti prakīrṇapravṛttau vibhāgakaraṇātkriyāgrahaṇaṃ ceha niṣphalaṃ syāt | tasmādyatra kriyāṃ pratyavadhibhāvo nirūpyate tatra dvayīgatirnimittatvamātravivakṣā avastuvivakṣā vā, dvitīye 'pi kārakatvavivakṣā vā | ādye 'pyāśritāvadhibhāvasya vastvantaraparahetubhāvavivakṣā avastutvavivakṣā vā | dvitīye 'pi kārakatvakriyānubandhivyāpāratvam | pradhānakriyānukūlakriyāntarasamāveśa iti yāvat | taddvividhaṃ śabdābhihitam, atathābhūtaṃ ca | ādyaṃ kārakavibhakterviṣayaḥ, dvitīyaṃ hetuvibhakteḥ | dvayamapi ca kriyāviṣayameva | ṣaṇṇāmapi kārakāṇāṃ kriyāghaṭitamūrtitvāt | avastubhūtaṃ tu nimittamabhāvātmakatayā na vikriyate | vikārābhāvācca na kriyāviśiṣṭamatathābhāve | na ca kārakamiti tṛtīya eva prakāraḥ prasiddhakāryakāraṇabhāvaviparyāsenopanibadhyamāno heturāścaryakāritayā citra āropitamapi ca hetutvaṃ hetutvameveti bhavati caturthaḥ prakāraḥ | bahirasaṃbhāvyamānasyāpi kavipratibhāsaṃrambhotthāpyatayā camatkāraviśeṣārpaṇādakṣuṇṇaivālaṃkāratā | yadāha—‘ko hi pratītimātrakāvye vastusthitiṃ bhāvayet’ iti | tadetatsarvamabhisaṃdhāya vibhāgamāha—kāraka ityādi ||
yaḥ pravṛttiṃ nivṛttiṃ ca prayuktiṃ cāntarā viśan |
udāsīno 'pi vā kuryātkārakaṃ tatpracakṣate || 13 ||
asataḥ sattā pravṛttiḥ | sato 'pagamo nivṛttiḥ | pravartamānasya pravartanā prayuktiḥ | antarā viśannupāttayuktiḥ | udāsīno 'tathābhūtaḥ | tena kārakasya ṣaṭū prakārāḥ ||
teṣu pravartakaḥ kriyāviṣṭo yathā—
‘ayamāndolitaprauḍhacandanadrumapallavaḥ |
utpādayati sarvasya prītiṃ malayamārutaḥ || 19 ||’
so 'yaṃ yathokto malayamārutaḥ prītyutpādanakriyāsamāveśātpravartako nāma kārakahetubhedaḥ ||
sa eva kriyānāviṣṭo yathā—
‘tasya rājñaḥ prabhāveṇa tadudyānāni jajñire |
ārdrāṃśukapravālānāmāspadaṃ suraśākhinām || 20 ||’
﻿
atra prabhāvaḥ kriyāyāmaniviśamāna eva hetau tṛtīyāṃ pravartayati na kartarīti kriyāyāmanāviṣṭakārakahetubhedaḥ ||
tasya rājñaḥ prabhāvenetyatra sadapi kartṛtvamavivakṣitaṃ, ato hetumātravivakṣāyāṃ pākṣikī tṛtīyā bhavatītyāha—hetau tṛtīyāyāmiti | karaṇabhāvastvasaṃbhāvita eva prabhāvamātrasya vyabhicārāt ||
nivartakaḥ kriyāviṣṭo yathā—
‘candanāraṇyamādhūya spṛṣṭ‍vā malayanirjharān |
pathikānāṃ pramāthāya pavano 'yamupasthitaḥ || 21 ||’
atraivaṃvidhasya pavanasya pathikapramāthasādhanakriyāyāṃ kartṛtvenāveśānnivartako nāmāyamāviṣṭakriyaḥ kārakahetubhedaḥ ||
pramāthasādhanakriyāyāṃ kartṛtveneti niṣṭhāpratyayenopātteneti bhāvaḥ ||
sa eva kriyānāviṣṭo yathā—
‘prajāgarātkhilībhūtastasyāḥ svapnasamāgamaḥ |
bāṣpastu na dadātyenāṃ draṣṭuṃ citragatāmapi || 22 ||’
atra samāgamanivṛttāvaniviśamānaḥ prajāgarastṛtīyārthe pañcamīṃ prayojayati | bāṣpaḥ punardānakriyāveśāddarśanakriyāyāmanāviśankarmasaṃbandhāttāmapradhānabhāvena copagṛhṇātītyanāviṣṭakriyo nāma nivartako 'yaṃ kārakahetubhedaḥ ||
khilībhāvo nivṛttiḥ | tṛtīyārtha iti | hetāvavadhitvāpratīterapādānabhāvena saṃbhāvitaḥ | dānakriyeti | syādatra darśanakriyāsamāveśo yadi dānakriyāveśaḥ syāt | sa eva tu nāsti nañā niṣedhādityarthaḥ ||
prayojakaḥ kriyāviṣṭo yathā—
‘tasmiñjīvati durdharṣe hatamapyahataṃ balam |
hanūmatyujjhitaprāṇe jīvanto 'pi mṛtā vayam || 23 ||’
﻿
atra balapratyujjīvanamaraṇakriyayoḥ saptamīvācyanaimittikādhikaraṇakārakabhāvena hanūmānāviśanprayojako bhavatīti kriyāviṣṭo 'yaṃ prayojako nāma kārakahetubhedaḥ ||
tasmiñjīvatīti | jīvanamaraṇayorbalasyaiva svātantryaṃ hanūmānprayojayati | prayojakatā cāsya (te eva) jīvatyujjhitaprāṇe iti padābhyāmupāttā | katabhatkārakamidaṃ bhavatītyāha—saptamīvācyeti | nanu ca—‘aṅa‍gulyagre madakalaghaṭāndarśayantīva dhūrtā’ ityādau kālpanikādāvapi saptamībhāvātkathaṃ kārakatetyata āha—naimittiketi | anyasyāsaṃbhavāditi bhāvaḥ ||
sa eva kriyānāviṣṭo yathā—
‘mānayogyāṃ karomīti priyasthānasthitāṃ sakhīm |
bālā bhrūbhaṅa‍gajihmākṣī paś‍yati sphuritādharā || 24 ||’
atra mānābhyāsakriyāyā bhrūbhaṅa‍gajihmākṣiprekṣaṇādirūpāyā ātmanyevātmanaḥ samāveśo na bhavatīti kriyānāviṣṭo 'yamiti śabdābhidheyaprayojako nāma kārakahetubhedaḥ ||
mānayogyāmiti | bhrūbhaṅa‍gajihmākṣisphuritādharādiprekṣaṇārūpāyāṃ mānābhyāsakriyāyāmapi bālāyāḥ svātantryaṃ, tādṛśīṃ tu tāmiti śabdanirdeś‍yo 'bhiprāyaviśeṣaḥ prayuṅa‍kte | tasya tu na kriyāntaramupāttam | upāttāyāstu mānakriyāyāḥ svātmani samāveśo 'nupapannaḥ | abhiprāyo 'pi hi vyāpārapracayarūpakriyāntarbhūta eva | yadāha mahābhāṣyakāraḥ—‘yat kiṃcittadabhisaṃdhipūrvakaṃ preṣaṇamadhyeṣaṇaṃ vā tatsarvaṃ pacyartha’ iti | smaraṇādikaṃ cāsya vyāpāraḥ saṃbhavatītyato nākārakatvaṃ vācyam | tadetadabhisaṃdhāyāha—ātmanyevātmana iti ||
dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā ca caturthī saptamī ca yam |
kriyānāviṣṭamācaṣṭe lakṣaṇaṃ jñāpakaśca saḥ || 14 ||
sa dvitīyāvācyo yathā—
‘tāṃ pratyabhivyaktamanorathānāṃ mahīpatīnāṃ praṇayāgradūtyaḥ |
pravālaśobhā iva pādapānāṃ śṛṅa‍gāraceṣṭā vividhā babhūvuḥ || 25 ||
﻿
atra kriyānāviṣṭatayaivendumatyāṃ mahīpatīnāṃ śṛṅa‍gāraceṣṭā bhavantyo lakṣyante | so 'yaṃ lakṣaṇahetuḥ pratinā yoge dvitīyāmutpādayati ||
iha pañcaiva lakṣaṇe vibhaktayo vihitāḥ | tadyathā | ‘anurlakṣaṇe 1|4|84’, ‘lakṣaṇetthaṃbhūta 1|4|90’ ityādinā karmasaṃjñāṃ vidhāya ‘karmapravacanīyayukte 2|3|8’ iti dvitīyā | ‘yenāṅa‍gavikāraḥ 2|3|20’, ‘itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇe 2|3|21’ ityetābhyāṃ tṛtīyā | ‘utpātena jñāpite ca 1|4|44 vā.’ iti caturthī | ‘yasya ca bhāvena bhāvalakṣaṇam 2|3|37’ iti saptamī | ‘ṣaṣṭhī cānādare 2|3|38’ iti ṣaṣṭhī | tadetadāha—dvitīyā ceti | ṣaṣṭhīmagre vakṣyati | ‘ṣaṣṭhī cānādare 2|3|38’ iti sūtre cakārasya samucceyatayā na pradhānā seti nātra tulyakakṣatayā gaṇitā | kriyānāviṣṭaṃ svavyāpāraśūnyaṃ taṭasthameva yavdyāpriyate, tena kārakādbhedaḥ | atra hi kriyānāviṣṭasyaiva indumatyāmitīndumatīmālambanavibhāvīkṛtya (vidhīya)mānāḥ śṛṅa‍gāraceṣṭāstayaivāvacchidyante, tadavasthā eva ca lakṣyante, tato bhavati hetutvaṃ lakṣaṇatvamavadhitvaṃ ceti | nanu kathamatra dvitīyā, yāvatā hetutvāttṛtīyayā bhavitavyamityata āha—dvitīyāmiti | nāprāptāyāṃ tṛtīyāyāmiyaṃ vidhīyamānā balavatī tāṃ bādhata ityarthaḥ ||
tṛtīyāvācyamitthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇaṃ yathā—
‘kaṇṭhekālaḥ karasthena kapālenenduśekharaḥ |
jaṭābhiḥ snigdhatāmrābhirāvirāsīdvṛṣadhvajaḥ || 26 ||
atra kaṇṭhekāla ityādīni kriyāyāmaniviśamānānyeva vṛṣadhvajaṃ jñāpayanti yathā jaṭābhistāpasa iti ||
kaṇṭhekāla ityādīnīti | yadyapi kapālena jaṭābhirityevodāharaṇaṃ tathāpi prasaṅa‍gāditaravdyākhyānaṃ jñāpakatvam | ubhayatrāpi tulyavibhaktivācyatāyāṃ tu viśeṣaḥ | tenānyo 'pyevaṃjātīyo lakṣaṇaprakāraḥ svayamūhanīya ityuktaṃ bhavati, yadvakṣyati ‘upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat’ ityādinā | uktameva prasiddhodāharaṇena draḍhayati—yathā jaṭābhiriti | yathāhītthaṃbhūtasya tenaiva prakāreṇa prakāravato lakṣaṇaṃ jaṭā bhavanti tathehāpi kapālādikamiti bhāvaḥ ||
tṛtīyāvācya evāṅa‍gavikāralakṣaṇaṃ yathā—
‘sa bāla āsīdvapuṣā caturbhujo mukhena pūrṇendunibhastrilocanaḥ |
yuvā karākrāntamahībhṛduccakairasaṃśayaṃ saṃprati tejasā raviḥ || 27’
﻿
atra vapuṣā caturbhujo mukhena trilocanastejasā ravirityaṅa‍gavikārairaṅa‍gino vikṛtirlakṣyate yathākṣṇā kāṇa iti ||
tṛtīyāvācya eveti | sūtre 'ṅa‍gapadenāṅa‍gī lakṣyate | tasya ca saṃbandhiniyamādaṅa‍gavācinastṛtīyā bhavati | aṅa‍gaṃ ca dvividhamājānikamaupacārikaṃ ca dvayamapīha vivakṣitaṃ vikārādikaṃ cetthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇamevedam | ata eva sūtrakramo nāddata ityāśayavānvyācaṣṭe—atra vapuṣeti | vikṛtiravasthāntaraprāptiḥ ||
caturthīvācyamutpātalakṣaṇaṃ yathā—
‘gonāsāya niyojitāgadarajāḥ sarpāya baddhauṣadhiḥ kaṇṭhasthāya viṣāya vīryamahite pāṇau maṇīnbibhratī |
bharturbhūtagaṇāya gotrajaratīnirdiṣṭamantrākṣarā rakṣatvadrisutā vivāhasamaye prītā ca bhītā ca vaḥ || 28 ||’
atra gauryā vivāhamaṅa‍galānaucityenotpātarūpairagadarajoniyogādibhirbhagavadgatā gonāsādayo jñāpyante, yathā vātāya kapilā vidyuditi | tataścotpātena jñāpiteceti saṃbandhasyobhayaniṣṭhatvāttādarthya iva lakṣyavācinaścaturthī na lakṣaṇavācinaḥ | tṛtīyāviṣayāpahārādekayaiva ca vibhaktyobhayagatasyāpi saṃbandhasya rājñaḥ puruṣa itivaduktatvāttṛtīyāpi na bhavati ||
gonāsāyeti | nanūtpātenāviṣṭena yajjñāpyate tatra caturthīti lakṣaṇamevāsyā vācyaṃ pratibhāti, naitat | lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvo 'sāvabhidhīyate na tu lakṣye . . . . . | tataśca yato vidhīyate tasya lakṣaṇīyatāmarthāditarasya lakṣaṇatāṃ bodhayatīti | agadarajaḥprabhṛtayastu kathamamaṅa‍galarūpā ityavaśiṣyate | tatrāha—atra gauryā ityādi | nanu tathāpi lakṣaṇavācina eva caturthīti kathamavasitabhityata āha—tataśceti | yathā tādarthyasyobhayaniṣṭhatve 'pi kaṅa‍kaṇāya kanakamityatra kāryavācina eva caturthī na tu kāraṇavācinaḥ, tathehāpi saṃbandhasyobhayāśrayatve 'pi lakṣyavācina eva caturthī natu lakṣaṇavācina ityarthaḥ | tarhi tṛtīyā kathaṃ na bhavatītyata āha—ekayaiva ceti | saṃbandhasya saṃbandhināveva viśeṣastena lakṣaṇamapi caturthyeva pratipādayatyata āha—uktārthatvātkathaṃ tṛtīyā na bhavatīti śuddhaprātipadikārthābhidhāne prathameti bhāvaḥ || ﻿
saptamīvācyaṃ bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ yathā—
‘iti śāsati senānyāṃ gacchatastānanekadhā |
niṣidhya hasatā kiṃcittasthe tatrāndhakāriṇā || 29 ||’
atra senānyaḥ palāyamānagaṇānuśāsanakriyayāndhakāreḥ svaprakāśanakriyā lakṣyate yathā—‘goṣu duhyamānāsu gataḥ’ iti | upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat | tenānyadapi bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ śatrādyabhidheyamupalakṣyate, yathātraiva hasatā tasthe iti ||
‘yasya ca bhāvena bhāvalakṣaṇam 2|3|37’ ityasya sūtrasyārthastu yasya vastuno bhāvena kriyayā vastvantarasya bhāvaḥ kriyā lakṣyate tadvacanātsaptamītyata āha—atra senānya iti | hasatā tastha iti lakṣaṇe śatṛvidhiḥ ‘lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ 3|2|126’ iti sūtraṇāt ||
yathā vā—
‘yajvabhiḥ saṃbhṛtaṃ havyaṃ vitateṣvadhvareṣu saḥ |
jātavedomukhānmāyī miṣatāmācchinatti naḥ || 30 ||’
ityanādaropādhike bhāvalakṣaṇe ṣaṣṭhyapi bhavatīti ||
abhāvaḥ prāgabhāvādibhedeneha caturvidhaḥ |
ghaṭābhāvādibhedāttu tasya saṃkhyā na vidyate || 15 ||
abhāvasāmānyamabhāvapramāṇanirūpaṇaprastāve ‘asattāyāḥ padārthānām’ ityanena vakṣyati | tenātra sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ na kṛtavān | sa dvividhastādātmyapratiyogikaḥ, saṃsargapratiyogikaśca | dvitīyastridhā prāk‌pradhvaṃsātyantābhāvabhedāt | tadāha—prāgabhāvāditi | nanu na prāgabhāvādireko 'sti pratiyogibhedena bhedādityata āha—ghaṭābhāvādīti | anena rūpeṇa saṃkhyā nāstyeva | sāmānyaṃ tu prāgabhāvatvādikamāśritya cāturvidhyam, so 'yaṃ tuśabdasyārthaḥ ||
teṣu prāgabhāvo yathā—
‘anabhyāsena vidyānāmasaṃsargeṇa dhīmatām |
anigraheṇa cākṣāṇāṃ vyasanaṃ jāyate nṛṇām || 31 ||’
﻿
atra vidyānabhyāsādeḥ prāgabhāvasya vyasanādikāraṇatvam ||
pradhvaṃsābhāvo yathā—
‘gataḥ kāmakathonmādo galito yauvanajvaraḥ |
gato mohaścyutā tṛṣṇā kṛtaṃ puṇyāśrame manaḥ || 32 ||’
atra kāmakathonmādagamanādeḥ pradhvaṃsābhāvasya puṇyāśramānusandhānakāraṇatvam ||
anabhyāseneti | yāvadvidyāṃ nābhyasyanti tāvanna dhīmadbhiḥ saṃsṛjyante, yāvaccākṣāṇi na nigṛhṇanti tāvavdyasanamiti vivakṣitam | tena nātyantābhāvasaṃkaraḥ | ārādhyāstvāhuḥ—‘śikṣāparasyāsya ślokasyāpyanyaprayojanakatayā nātyantābhāvasaṃkaraḥ’ iti ||
itaretarābhāvo yathā—
‘vanānyamūni na gṛhāṇyetā nadyo na yoṣitaḥ |
mṛgā ime na dāyādāstanme nandati mānasam || 33 ||’
atra vanāni amūni na gṛhāṇītyāderitaretarābhāvasya manaḥpramodakāraṇatvam ||
vanānyamūnīti | idamidaṃ na bhavatīti pratītisākṣika evānyonyābhāvaḥ | vaidharmyaṃ tu bhedākhyamalaṃkārāntaraṃ kiṃciddharmamantarbhāvyaiva svarūpasyāpi bhedavyavahārapātratā ||
atyantābhāvo yathā—
‘atyantamasadāryāṇāmanālocitaceṣṭitam |
atasteṣu vivardhante nirvibandhā vibhūtayaḥ || 34 ||’
atrānālocitaceṣṭitasyātyantābhāvo vibhūtīnāṃ nirvighnavṛddhihetuḥ | etenābhāvābhāvo 'pi vyākhyātaḥ | ﻿
atra prāgabhāvābhāvo yathā—
‘udyānasahakārāṇāmanudbhinnā na mañjarī |
deyaḥ pathikanārīṇāṃ satilaḥ salilāñjaliḥ || 35 ||’
atra vastuna utpādaḥ prāgabhāvābhāva ucyate | teneha sahakāramañjarīmudbhedasya pathikanārīṇāṃ maraṇe kāraṇatvam ||
vastuna utpāda iti | bhāva evābhāvābhāvavyavahārabhūmiḥ | abhāvavyavahāraviṣayamātrasya ca vibhāgaḥ kṛto 'sti | prāgabhāvādeḥ pradhvaṃsādirūpateti na nyūnatā vibhāgavākyasyāśaṅa‍kanīyā | teneti | bhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇe bhūtaṃ bhavyāyeti nyāyānmañjarīṇāmudbhedasya kārakatālābho 'nyathā vākyabhede na kiṃcitsyāt | prāgabhāvātprāgabhāvābhāvabhaṅa‍gyā ca samastamañjarīsamudbhedena vasantapraụdhidhvananātprakṛtavipralambhaḥ poṣaḥ ||
pradhvaṃsābhāvābhāvo yathā—
‘pīnaśroṇi gabhīranābhi nibhṛtaṃ madhye bhṛśoccastanaṃ pāyādvaḥ parirabdhamabdhiduhituḥ kāntena kāntaṃ vapuḥ |
svāvāsānupaghātanirvṛtamanāstatkālamīladdṛśe yasmai so 'cyutanābhipadmavasatirvedhāḥ śivaṃ dhyāyati || 36 ||’
atra yathoktena vapuṣā yo 'yamāliṅa‍gane 'pi vidhinivāsanābhipaṅa‍kajānupaghātaḥ, sa iha vastuno 'vasthānameva pradhvaṃsābhāvābhāva ucyate | sa cehācyutanābhipaṅa‍kajanivāsino vidhermanonirvāṇakāraṇaṃ bhavati ||
pīnaśroṇīti | nibhṛtaṃ durlakṣyam | abdhiduhitāpi sarvāṅa‍gīṇamāśleṣamabhilaṣati bhagavānapīti kāntena kāntamityetābhyāmabhivyajyate | upalakṣaṇaṃ cedam | tādātmyātyantābhāvābhāvāvapyudāharaṇīyau | yathā—‘avanirudakaṃ tejo vāyurnabhaḥ śaśibhāskarau puruṣa iti yatkecidbhinnā vadanti tanūstava | tadanagha vacovaicitrībhirnirāvaraṇasya te vidadhati payaḥpūronmīlanmṛṣā mihiropamām ||’ atra bhinna ityanyonyābhāvamupanyasya nirāvaraṇasya mṛṣetyetābhyāṃ niṣedhaḥ | yathā ca—‘na vidyate yadyapi sarvavāsanāguṇānubandhi pratibhānamadbhutam | śrutena yatnena ca vāgu-﻿
pāsitā dhruvaṃ karotyeva kamapyanugraham ||' atra na vidyata ityatyantābhāvamupanyasya kamapīti pratibhāsattābhidhānena pratiṣedhaḥ ||
vidūrakāryaḥ sahajaḥ kāryānantarajastathā |
yukto na yukta ityevamasaṃkhyāścitrahetavaḥ || 16 ||
te 'mī prayogamārgeṣu gauṇavṛttivyapāśrayāḥ |
kāryāḥ kāvyeṣu vaicitryaṃ tathā te kartumīśate || 17 ||
teṣu vidūrakāryo yathā—
‘anaśnuvānena yugopamānamalabdhamaurvīṃkiṇalāñchanena |
aspṛṣṭakhaḍgatsaruṇāpi cāsīdrakṣāvatī tasya bhujena bhūmiḥ 37’
so 'yaṃ bālya eva navayauvanakāryakaraṇādvidūrakāryo nāma citrahetuḥ ||
vidūrakārya iti | kālāntarabhāvyavasthāsaṃpādyaṃ prāgavasthāvata eva kāryamupajāyamānaṃ yatrocyate sa vidūrakāryastacca kāryaṃ śaktiviśeṣādhīnamiti bālye 'pi prabhāvātiśayadarśanādbhujenaiva rakṣā kṛteti gauṇavṛttivyapāśrayatā ||
sahajo yathā—
‘samameva samākrāntaṃ dvayaṃ dviradagāminā |
tena siṃhāsanaṃ pitryamakhilaṃ cārimaṇḍalam || 38 ||’
atra rājyābhiṣekaripumaṇḍalākramaṇayorhetuhetumadbhāvena satyapi paurvāparye kṣiprakāritvāttulyameva kāryakāraṇabhāvo vivakṣitastena sahajo nāmāyaṃ citrahetuḥ ||
sahajaḥ kārye sahotpattikatayā nibaddhaḥ | kāraṇaśaktiprakarṣātsamakālamiva kāryaṃ pratibhāsate, tena hetuśaktiprakarṣābhivyaktiratra mūlam | ‘yadagre dadati yathā vā kartumīśate’ iti | evamanantaraje 'pi kiṃ kāraṇaṃ pūrvamuta kāryamasti sa eva vyaṅa‍gyaḥ | yukte 'pi kāraṇaguṇānuvidhāyi kāryamasadevāropyate na pramukteti tadeva viparītamiti gauṇavṛttyāśrayatā || ﻿
kāryānantarajo yathā—
‘paścātparyasya kiraṇānudīrṇaṃ candramaṇḍalam |
prāgeva hariṇākṣīṇāmudīrṇo rāgasāgaraḥ || 39 ||’
atra candrodayalakṣaṇāddhetoḥ pūrvakālameva rāgasāgara udīrṇa iti kāryasyodayalābhaḥ | sa iha guṇavṛttyāśrayaṇe hetāvatiśayaṃ puṣyatītyayaṃ kāryānantarajo nāma citrahetuḥ ||
yukto yathā—
‘guṇānurāgamiśreṇa yaśasā te prasarpatā |
digvadhūnāṃ mukhe jātamakasmādardhakuṅa‍kumam || 40 ||’
atra digvadhūmukheṣu te guṇānurāgaḥ kuṅa‍kumaṃ, yaśastu candanamityayaṃ yukto nāma gauṇavṛttivyapāśrayaścitrahetuḥ ||
nayukto yathā—
‘na mīlayati padmāni na nabho 'pyavagāhate |
tvanmukhendurmamāsūnāṃ haraṇāyaiva yasyati || 41 ||’
atra mukhendoḥ padmanimīlanādi na yujyata iti nayukto nāma citrabhedaḥ ||
nanu vyaktibhede 'pi hetorasaṃkhyatā cedbivakṣitā kimevaṃ śabdenādhikenetyata āha—
evaṃ śabdasya prakāravācitvāvdyadhikaraṇādayaḥ prayujyante ||
vyadhikaraṇo yathā—
‘sā bālā vayamapragalbhavayasaḥ sā strī vayaṃ kātarāḥ sā pīnonnatimatpayodharayugaṃ dhatte sakhedā vayam |
sākrāntā jaghanasthalena guruṇā gantuṃ na śaktā vayaṃ doṣairanyajanāśrayairapaṭavo jātāḥ sma ityadbhutam || 42 ||’
﻿
atrābhivyaktameva vyadhikaraṇatvaṃ kāryakaraṇayoḥ pratīyata ityayaṃ vyadhikaraṇo nāma citrahetuḥ ||
evaṃ śabdasyeti | prakārasyopādhereva bhedo vivakṣito na tu vyaktimātrasyeti bhāvaḥ | sā bāleti | bālyādīnāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇya eva prāgalbhyādikaṃ prati hetubhāvaḥ pratītaḥ sa iha gauṇavṛttivyapāśrayatayonibadhyamānaḥ kāntimāvahati | tathāhi | anyatprāgalbhyaṃ bālāyāḥ saralālokitavāṅmiśraṇādyasāmarthyalakṣaṇam, anyacca nāyakaprakāṇḍe kathameṣāṃ niyantraṇā syādityanadhyavasāyalakṣaṇam | tayośca tadbhāvāpattiratra vyaktaiva | evaṃ kātaratvādau bodhyam | ādigrahaṇena svahetukatayā kāryahetukatayā copanibadhyamānaḥ saṃkalito bhavati ||
hetoranantaraṃ tadviparītamahetuṃ lakṣayannāha—
vastuno vā svabhāvena śaktervā hānihetunā |
akṛtātmīyakāryaḥ syādaheturvyāhatastu yaḥ || 18 ||
vastuna iti | hetutayā pratīto 'pi kāryaṃ na karotītyabhidhīyamāno 'hetuḥ | sa dvividhaḥ| svarūpeṇa kāryavyabhicārī, vyāpāravirodhena vā | tathābhūto 'pi ca kāryaṃ na karoti | tatra dvayaṃ nibandhanaṃ yadgataṃ kāryamupajanayitavyaṃ tasya vastunaḥ svabhāvo hetutvābhimatasya śaktihānirvā | sāpi dvidhā—ātyantiko 'bhāvaḥ, pratibandhamātraṃ vā | tatra vastusvabhāvena śakteratyantāsattvena ca dvirūpasvarūpāvyabhicārīkṛtātmīkārya ityanenoktam, vastusvabhāvena śaktipratibandhena ca dviprakāro 'pi ca vyāpārāvyabhicārī vyāhataḥ, ityanena yadyapi śaktiratyantāsattve hetubhāva eva na bhavati, tathāpi guṇavṛttyā hetubhāvādhyāso boddhavyaḥ | sā ca guṇavṛttiḥ śleṣopahitānyādṛśī bhavati |
nanu cātra ceṣṭāyā hetutvaṃ tṛtīyayā pratīyata iti sā hetutvena vaktumucitetyata āha—
tatra vastusvabhāvenākṛtakāryo yathā—
‘na viracitā lalāṭataṭalāsyakarī bhrukuṭi- rna paruṣahuṃkṛtena madhurasmitamantaritam |
﻿
na tava niśumbhasaṃbhramavaśādapi dāruṇayā bhagavati ceṣṭayā kaluṣitaṃ vadanāmburuham || 43 ||’
atra niśumbhasaṃbhramasya hetoranutpāditabhrukuṭyādidāruṇaceṣṭādvāreṇa bhagavatīmukhāmbukāluṣyasya karaṇe yadasāmarthyaṃ tatra tanmukhākhyasya vastunaḥ svabhāvo nimittamiti svabhāvādanutpāditakāryo 'yamahetuḥ ||
atra niśumbheti || bhrūkuṭyādidāruṇaceṣṭādvāreṇeti | anyathā niśumbhasaṃbhramavaśāditi pañcamī asaṃgatā syāditi bhāvaḥ ||
sa eva śakterhānihetuvā yathā—
‘anurāgavatī saṃdhyā divasastatpuraḥ saraḥ |
aho daivagatiścitrā tathāpi na samāgamaḥ || 44 ||’
atrānurāgavattvatatpuraḥ saratvayoḥ samāgamahetvoḥ sāmarthyavighāte daivagatiḥ kāraṇamiti śakterhānihetunāyamakṛtasvakāryo nāmā 'hetuḥ ||
anurāgo lauhityaṃ prītiśca | puraḥsaro 'gre gamanaśīlaḥ saṃnidhau sthitaśca ||
vastunaḥ svabhāvena vyāhato yathā—
‘nīvībandhocchvasanaśithilaṃ yatra yakṣāṅganānāṃ kṣaumaṃ rāgādanibhṛtakareṣvākṣipatsu priyeṣu |
arcistuṅgānabhimukhagatānprāpya ratnapradīpā- nhrīmụ̄dhānāṃ bhavati viphalaḥ preraṇācūrṇamuṣṭiḥ || 45 ||’
atra ratnapradīpanirvāpaṇe cūrṇamuṣṭerapatyaktasvarūpasyāpi vighāte ratnapradīpākhyavastusvabhāvaḥ kāraṇamityayaṃ vastusvabhāvena vyāhato nāmā 'hetubhūtaḥ ||
amṛtasekajīvitakaṅkālaktipratibandhe ko heturata āha—
sa eva śakterhānihetunā yathā—
‘śaṃbhoruddhatanṛtyakarmaṇi kare kaṅkālamādyaṃ hareḥ saṃghaṭṭasphuṭitendumaṇḍalagalatpīyūṣasaṃjīvitam |
﻿
tatkālapraṇate muradviṣi nave dṛṣṭvā vilāsaṃ śriyaḥ kurvatkopakaṣāyitena manasā mithyotplutīḥ pātu vaḥ || 46 ||’
atra kopakaṣāyitena manasastasyotplutikaraṇasamarthasyāpīśvarakaragrahaṇānmithyāpadābhidhīyamānaḥ pratīto vyāghātastato 'yaṃ śakterhānihetunā vyāhato nāmā hetubhedaḥ ||
īśvarakaragrahaṇājaditi | nanu kopakaṣāyitamanastvamutpāditakāryameva kathamanyathā kurvadītyucyate 'ta āha—mithyāpadeti ||
iha kaiścitkāraṇamālā pṛthagalaṃkāra ityuktam, pūrvasyottarottaraṃ prati hetubhāvoktistallakṣaṇam | sa dvividho 'bhidhīyamānaḥ pratīyamāno vā | ubhayathāpi nāhetorvyatiricyata ityāha—
yastu kāraṇamāleti hetusaṃtāna ucyate |
pṛthakpṛthagasāmarthyātso 'pyahetorna bhidyate || 19 ||
eko 'bhidhīyamāneṣu hetutveṣu bhavettayoḥ |
pratīyamāneṣvaparaḥ kāraṇatveṣu jāyate || 20 ||
yastviti | yadyapi prathamasya prathamaṃ hetubhāvo nivṛtta eva tathāpyuttarasya prathamamukhanirīkṣaṇapravṛttasyottaraṃ prati hetubhāvo 'bhidhīyate | na hi svatantrasyaiva hetubhāve kāraṇamālā bhāsate ||
tadidamekadeśadvārā vyañjayannāha—
tayorādyo yathā—
‘jitendriyatvaṃ vinayasya kāraṇaṃ guṇaprakarṣo vinayādavāpyate |
guṇādhike puṃsi jano 'nurajyate janānurāgaprabhavāśca saṃpadaḥ || 47 ||’
atra jitendriyatvādīnāmuttarottaraṃ prati hetubhūtānāmapi saṃpadutpattau pūrvapūrvasavyapekṣāyāṃ samuditānāmeva kāraṇatvaṃ sādhanādipadairabhidhīyata iti so 'yamabhidhīyamānahetutvakāraṇamāletyahetubhedaḥ || ﻿
dvitīyo yathā—
‘pīṇattuṇa duggejjaṃ jassa bhuraāantaṇiṭṭhurapariggahiam |
riṭṭhassa visamavaliaṃ kaṃṭhaṃ dukkheṇa jīviaṃ volīṇam || 48 ||’
[pīnatvena durgrāhyaṃ yasya bhujayorantarniṣṭhuraparigṛhītam |
riṣṭasya viṣamavalitaṃ kaṇṭhaṃ duḥkhena jīvitamatikrāntam ||]
atra jīvitaduḥkhātikramaṇe kaṇṭhasya valanaṃ, valanasya niṣṭhuragrahaṇaṃ, niṣṭhuragrahaṇasyāpi pīnatvena durgrāhyatvaṃ heturiti pratīyamānakāraṇatvaṃ kāraṇamāletyahetubhedaḥ ||
atra jitendriyatvādīnāmiti | atra jīvitaduḥkhātikramaṇa iti | yadyatra hetumālā na syāttadā parasparānapekṣāyāmupanyāse vākyārthapoṣo( 'pi) na syāditi ||
lakṣaṇātmakahetuviśeṣasya sādharmyādanantaraṃ sūkṣmaṃ lakṣayati—
iṅgitākāralakṣyo 'rthaḥ sūkṣmaḥ sūkṣmaguṇāttu saḥ |
sūkṣmātpratyakṣataḥ sūkṣmo 'pratyakṣa iti bhidyate || 21 ||
vācyaḥ pratīyamānaśca sūkṣmo 'tra dvividho mataḥ |
iṅgitākāralakṣyatvaṃ lakṣyasāmānyametayoḥ || 22 ||
tatreṅgitalakṣyamabhidhīyamānasūkṣmaṃ yathā—‘tāṃ pratyabhivyaktamanorathānām’ iti | atra svayaṃvaramilitānāṃ rājñāṃ rājaputrīṃ prati prāptilakṣaṇasya manorathasyābhidhīyamānasya śṛṅgāraceṣṭātmakeneṅgitena vyaṅgyatvādayamiṅgitalakṣyo 'bhidhīyamānaḥ sūkṣmabhedaḥ ||
iṅgiteti | iṅgitamākāra iṅgitākārau cetyarthaḥ | śarīrāvayavavyāpāra iṅgitam | rūpāderanyathātvamākāraḥ | sūkṣmārthadarśanaṃ sūkṣmamityarthaguṇeṣūktaṃ tena paunaruktyamāśaṅkyāha—sūkṣmaguṇāttu sa iti | hṛdayasaṃvādabhāgitricaturahṛdayasaṃvedyasya | ata evātisūkṣmārthasya pratyakṣāyamāṇatvātsūkṣmo nāmārthaguṇaḥ | yathāhi kaveḥ pratibhā sūkṣmaviśeṣollekhinī tathā tanmūlakaḥ śabdo 'pīti sphuṭābhatayā pratyakṣa﻿-
prameyajñānamutpadyate | tathāhyanyonyasaṃvalitetyādau dampatyormitho 'nusmṛtilakṣaṇasya premṇaḥ katipayasaṃvedyasyāpi śabdabalātpratyakṣāyamāṇatvamanubhavasiddhameva | tadetadāha—sūkṣmātpratyakṣata iti | sūkṣmālaṃkāre tu kavipratibhāyā liṅgaviṣayatvācchabdo 'pi tadviṣaya eva | liṅgācca pratītirutpadyamānā sāmānyapuraskāreṇa pravṛttā na pratyakṣavattadviśeṣollekhakṣameti sūkṣmaguṇavaidharmyam | tadidamuktam—sūkṣmo 'pratyakṣa iti | atra kaiścitpratīyamānasya sūkṣmasya bhāva iti saṃjñāṃ vidhāyālaṃkārāntaramuktaṃ tadasat, sūkṣmasāmānyalakṣaṇena kroḍīkaraṇādityāha—iṅgitākāralakṣyatvamiti | etena lakṣyatvapunaruktyāśaṅkā parihṛtā | atra svayaṃvareti | na ca śṛṅgāraceṣṭāpratyarpitasya manorathaśabdenābhidhīyamānamarthaṃ punaruktamiti vācyam | nahi yathānurāgānubhāvena cittavṛttayaḥ sphuṭā upasthāpyante tathā svaśabdeneti vistareṇa saprapañcameva vakṣyāmaḥ | svaśabdastu kimarthamityavaśiṣyate tatra brūmaḥ | svayaṃvarasamājapraveśādinā yeṣāṃ sāmānyata utkaṇṭhā pratītipathamavatīrṇāsītteṣāmindumatīsaṃnidhau tadanubhāvabalenāsaṃkhyasūkṣmaviśeṣavatī saivābhivyakteti dṛ̣dhānubandhalakṣaṇasya premṇaḥ prakarṣakāṣṭhāṃ puṣṇāti | evamanyatrāpi ||
tadevākāralakṣyaṃ yathā—
‘sā yūni tasminnabhilāṣabandhaṃ śaśāka śālīnatayā na vaktum |
romāñcalakṣyeṇa sa gātrayaṣṭiṃ bhittvā nirākrāmadārālakeś‍yāḥ || 49 ||
atrābhilāṣabandho romāñcalakṣyeṇa gātrayaṣṭiṃ bhittvā nirākrāmadityanenābhidhīyamāna ākāralakṣyaḥ sūkṣmabhedo 'bhihitaḥ ||
tadevobhayalakṣyaṃ yathā—
‘tvadarpitadṛśastasyā gītagoṣṭhyāmavardhata |
uddāmarāgapiśunā chāyā kāpi mukhāmbuje || 50 ||’
atra tvadarpitadṛśa iti iṅgitacchāyā kāpi mukhāmbuja ityākārastābhyāmuddāmarāgapiśunetyanenābhidhīyamānasyānanarāgasya sūkṣmarūpatayā lakṣyamāṇatvādayamabhidhīyamānobhayalakṣyaḥ sūkṣmabhedaḥ || ﻿
lakṣaṇātmakahetuviśeṣasya sādharmyādanantaraṃ sūkṣmaṃ lakṣayati—
pratīyamānamiṅgitalakṣyaṃ yathā—
‘vāhittā paḍivaaṇaṃ ṇa dei rūsei ekkamekkammi |
ajjā kajjeṇa viṇā païppamāṇe ṇaīkacche || 51 ||
[vyāhṛtā prativacanaṃ na dadāti ruṣyatyekaikasmin |
āryā kāryeṇa vinā pradīpyamāne nadīkacche ||]
atra prativacanādānaṃ parijanaprakopābhyāṃ pradīpyamāne nadīkacche iti hetunā pratyāyyamānaḥ saṃketakuḍyāṅgadāvodbhavavadhūmanastāpo vākyārthatvena lakṣita ityayamiṅgitalakṣyaḥ pratīyamānaḥ sūkṣmabhedaḥ ||
atra prativacanādanamiti | nahi prativacanapradānābhāvamātramatra camatkārakāri, tasmādanyathāpi saṃbhavāt, ataḥ prativacanapradānābhiprāyā viparītacittavṛttiviśeṣonnāyikā samīpadeśāpasaraṇādilakṣaṇā kriyā kācitprativacanāpradānapadenābhimatā | na ca prakopo 'pyanubhavarūpatāmanāsādayansvādanīyatāmāsādayatīti nūnaṃ tenāpi bhrūbhaṅgādirūpā kriyaivābhisaṃhitetyāśayavatoktamiṅgitābhyāmiti | yadyevaṃ taddhi kāvyaśobhānirvāhātkimanyena lakṣite neti | nahi yathoktaprativacanādyadānaprakopābhyāṃ kaścidvivakṣitārthalābha iti bhāvaḥ ||
pratīyamānamevākāralakṣyaṃ yathā—
‘sāmāi sāmalīe addhacchippaloamuhasohā |
jambūdalakaakaṇṇāvaaṃse bhamire haliaütte || 52 ||’
[ś‍yāmāyāḥ ś‍yāmalatayā ardhākṣipraloka(na)mukhaśobhā |
jambūdalakṛtakarṇāvataṃse bhramati halikaputre ||]
atrārdhākṣipralonamukhaś‍yāmatābhyāmākārabhyāṃ jambūdalakalpitāvataṃsa ityanena pratyāyyamānaḥ saṃketagamanabhraṃśasaṃbhavaḥ ś‍yāmāyā matastāpo lakṣyata ityayamākāralakṣyaḥ pratīyamānaḥ sūkṣmabhedaḥ || ﻿
tadevobhayalakṣyaṃ yathā—
‘prayacchatoccaiḥ kusumāni māninī vipakṣagotraṃ dayitena lambhitā |
na kiṃcidūce caraṇena kevalaṃ lilekha bāṣpākulalocanā muvam || 53 ||’
atra caraṇena bhūmilekhanamiṅgitaṃ dṛśorbāṣpākulatvamākhārastābhyāṃ gotraskhalanodbhavo māninyā manastāpaḥ pratīyamāna itīṅgitākāralakṣyaḥ sūkṣmabhedaḥ ||
vibhajyamānasya sarūpatayā sūkṣmānantaramuttaralakṣaṇamāha—
padārthānāṃ tu yaḥ sārastaduttaramihocyate |
sa dharmadharmirūpābhyāṃ vyatirekācca bhidyate || 23 ||
padārthānāṃ tviti | sāraḥ sarvasvāyamānamutkarṣaśāli vastu | padārthānāmiti nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī | uttaramityanvartha nāma | utkṛṣṭatvamudo 'rthastatraiva prakarṣastarapaḥ | dharmadharmirūpābhyāmiti | vyastasamastābhyām | dharma upasarjanaṃ parapravaṇatayā pratīyamānaṃ vastu | atathābhūtaṃ tu dharmirūpam | tadayamarthaḥ—prasiddhavastumadhye kasyacidutkarṣavattayā nirdhāraṇamuttaram | tannidhā | dharmarūpaṃ dharmirūpamubhayaṃ ca | ādyayoḥ pratyekaṃ prakāradvayam | nirdhāryamāṇasya śuddhasyopādānaṃ, nirdhāryānuttaravyatirekidharmavattayā vā | tadidamāha—vyatirekācceti | antyasyāpi sāmānyaviśeṣarūpatayā rūpatvamiti ṣaṭprakāramuttaramiti ||
teṣu dharmasvarūpaṃ yathā—
‘dānaṃ vittādṛtaṃ vācaḥ kīrtidharmau tathāyuṣaḥ |
paropakaraṇaṃ kāyādasārātsāramuddharet || 54 ||’
atra dānasatyakīrtyādīnāṃ vittādivastudharmāṇāṃ sārabhūtānāmuddhārādayaṃ dharmarūpaḥ sāraḥ ||
vittādivastudharmāṇāmiti | pañcamyā vibhāgaḥ pratyāyitaḥ | sa ca saṃśleṣapūrvaka eveti dānādīnāmupasarjanatāpratītiḥ || ﻿
dharmirūpo yathā—
‘madhuvikacasitotpalāvataṃsaṃ śaśikarapallavitaṃ ca harmyapṛṣṭham |
madanajanitavibhramā ca kāntā sukhamidamarthavatāṃ vibhūtayo 'nyāḥ || 55 ||’
atra madhuprabhṛtīnāṃ vibhūtibhyaḥ sārabhūtānāmuddharaṇādayaṃ dharmirūpaḥ sāraḥ ||
vibhūtibhya iti | vibhūtayaḥ prathamānirdiṣṭāstena pūrvavannāmūṣāṃ dharmibhāvena pratītibhāso 'stīti viśiṣṭamadhvādirūpaṃ vastunāṅgabhāvena gamyata iti ||
atha vyatirekeṇa dharmarūpo yathā—
‘poḍhamahilāṇaṃ jajjaṃ susikkhiaṃ taṃ rae suhāvei |
jajjaṃ asikkhiaṃ ṇavavahūṇaṃ taṃtaṃ raïṃ dei || 56 ||’
[prauḍhamahilānāṃ yadyatsuśikṣitaṃ tadratau sukhayati |
yadyadaśikṣitaṃ navavadhūnāṃ tattadratiṃ dadāti ||]
atra praụdhānāṃ suśikṣitaṃ suratakarma, aprauḍhastrīṇāṃ punaraśikṣitaṃ sukhayatīti karmāntaralakṣaṇebhyo dharmebhyaḥ suśikṣitāśikṣitaratakarmalakṣaṇā dharmāḥ strīdharmāvyatirekeṇa pratipādyanta iti dharmavyatirekarūpo 'yaṃ sāraḥ ||
aprauḍhastrīṇāmiti | ṣaṣṭhyā dharmadharmibhāvo 'bhihitaḥ | tarhi nirdhāraṇaṃ kasmādityata āha—karmāntareti | rata ityanena sāmānyata upādānāt prauḍhastrīsaṃbandhino lalitasya suśikṣitatvaṃ viśeṣamupādāya mugdhastrīsaṃbandhino 'śikṣitattvaṃ vyatirekī viśeṣa upāttaḥ ||
vyatirekeṇa dharmirūpo yathā—
‘rājye sāraṃ vasudhā vasudhāyāṃ pattanaṃ pure saudham |
saudhe talpaṃ talpe varāṅganānaṅgasarvasvam || 57 ||’
atra vasudhādayo dharmiṇa uttarottarakrameṇa pūrvataḥ pūrvato vyatiricyanta ityayaṃ dharmavyatirekaḥ sāraḥ || ﻿
atra vasudhādaya iti | nirdhāritādvasudhāmātrātpattanavatī vasudhā vyatiricyate | vasudhāvatpattanātsaudhavatpattanam | saudhāttalpavatsaudhāttalpādvarāṅganāvaditi tadidamuktaṃ uttarottarakrameṇeti ||
etena dharmadharmisvarūpo 'pi vyākhyātaḥ | sa dvidhā | sāmānyato viśeṣataśca ||
tatra sāmānyato yathā—
‘gītaśītāṃśutāmbūlakarpūravanitādibhiḥ |
asāro 'pyeṣa saṃsāraḥ sāravāniva lakṣyate || 58 ||’
atra gītādīnāṃ jagataḥ sārabhūtānāmaviśeṣeṇaiva sarveṣāmupādānāddhetutṛtīyāntatayā ca saṃsārasāravattve 'ṅgabhāvādayaṃ sāmānyato dharmadharmirūpaḥ sāraḥ ||
atra gītādīnāmiti | nahi gītādau kaścidviśeṣa uktaḥ | ata evādiśabdo 'pi sajīvastathāpi dadhyādīnāmaṅgabhāvaḥ pratīyata ityata āha—tṛtīyāntatayā ceti | tṛtīyayā hiṃ kārakatvamuktam, kārakatvaṃ ca kriyopasarjanarūpamityarthaḥ ||
viśeṣato yathā—
‘avaimi pūtamātmānaṃ dvayenaiva dvijottamāḥ |
mūrdhni gaṅgāprapātena dhautapādāmbhasā ca vaḥ || 59 ||’
atra gaṅgāprapātasaptarṣipādodakayorviśeṣeṇa sārabhūtayorupādānāddhimavataḥ pūtatve cāṅgabhūtatvādayaṃ viśeṣato dharmadharmirūpaḥ sāraḥ ||
atra gaṅgāprapāteti | prapātapādodakayorgaṅgāyāḥ saptarṣibhiśca viśeṣitatvādaṅgatāmupapādayati—himavataḥ pūtatve ceti ||
vyatirekottare viruddhadharmākrāntirastīti saṅgatyā virodhalakṣaṇamāha—
virodhastu padārthānāṃ parasparamasaṅgatiḥ |
asaṅgatiḥ pratyanīkamadhikaṃ viṣamaśca saḥ || 24 ||
﻿
virodhastviti | parasparamasaṅgatirasaṃbandhaḥ, sahānavasthānamiti yāvat | tena sahānavasthānaniyatayoḥ sahānavasthānoktirvirodha iti tātparyam | saṃkṣepaḥ sa ca prarụ̄dho doṣaḥ | aprarohastu dvidhā | śleṣoṣadhānenānyathā cānyathābhāvastridhā | sahānavasthitayoḥ prāyodarśanamātreṇa naiyatyāropaḥ | yathā—‘kva yuvatimārdava’ mityādau viruddhadharmoktiviṣayasyācintyaprabhāvātiśayatvena prasiddhirvā | yathā ‘digvāsā yadī’tyādau virodhasyāropamātreṇa sarūpatayā pratipattimātraṃ vā | yathā ‘sā uppaḍī’ tyādau | sarvaścāyaṃ virodho 'bhidhīyamānaḥ pratīyamānaśca | athādiśabdena yo 'bhidhīyate so 'bhidhīyamānaḥ | pratīyamānastu tadvinākṛto yathā bhaṭṭabāṇasya ‘yatra mātaṅgagāminyaḥ śīlavatyaśca gauryo vibhavaratāśca ś‍yāmāḥ padmarāgiṇyaśca dhavaladvijaśucivadanā madirāmodiśvasanāḥ pramadāḥ’ iti | ihānyairalaṃkārakārairasaṃgatipratyānīkādhikāviṣamākhyaalaṃkāracatuṣṭayaṃ virodhātpṛthaglakṣitam | tallakṣaṇāni—‘viruddhakāryasaṃprāptirbhavettenaiva hetunā | parimāṇādiyogena vyavasthānamupeyuṣaḥ || avyavasthābhidhānaṃ yadadhikaṃ tatpracakṣate | kāraṇena virūpaṃ yatkāryamuktavaducyate || āścaryakāri tatprāhurviṣamaṃ śabdabuddhayaḥ |’ iti | tadeteṣāṃ lakṣaṇābhedādvirodha evāntarbhāvo na hyavāntarabhaṅgibhedamātreṇa sāmānyāntarbhāvo na bhavatītyāśayavānāha—asaṅgatiḥ pratyanīkamiti ||
teṣu virodhaḥ śuddho grathitaśca | tayorādyo yathā—
‘kva yuvatimārdavaṃ kva ca mahāhavadāruṇatā kva ca valayī karaḥ kva karidantajamuṣṭirasiḥ |
kva ca navayauvanaṃ kva kusumāyudhaniḥspṛhatā tava lalanāviceṣṭita/?/ lalitam || 60 ||’
atra yuvatimārdavādīnāṃ mahāhavadāruṇatādīnāṃ ca śuddhānāmeva parasparamasaṃgatatvādayaṃ śuddhavirodhaḥ ||
śuddhānāmeveti | ekenaiva pratiyoginā sahānavasthānoktau virodhanirbāhāt ||
dvitīyo yathā—
‘digvāsā yadi tatkimasya dhanuṣā śastrasya kiṃ bhasmanā bhasmāthāsya kimaṅganā yadi ca sā kāmaṃ paridveṣṭi kim |
﻿
ityanyonyaviruddhaceṣṭitamidaṃ paś‍yannijasvāmino bhṛṅa‍gīsāndraśirāvanaddhaparuṣaṃ dhatte 'sthiśeṣaṃ vapuḥ || 61 ||’
atra digvāsastvādīnāmuttarottaragrathanādanyonyāsaṃgatādayaṃ grathitanāmā virodhabhedaḥ ||
uttarottaragrathanāditi | yadyapyekena virodhinā sahoktau virodhyantareṇāpi tathā bhāvamāsādayanneva grathitastathāpyuttaragrathanayā śobhāviśeṣārpako bhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ ||
asaṅa‍gatiryathā—
‘sā uppaḍī goṭhṭhaühi ṇokkhī kāvi visagaṇṭhi |
bhiḍiya pacelliu so maraï jjassa ṇa laggaï kaṇṭhi || 62 ||’
[sā utpannā goṣṭhabhuvi navīnaiva kāpi viṣagranthiḥ |
bhidyate pratyuta sa mriyate yasya na lagati kaṇṭhe ||]
atrāyaṃ viṣagranthiryasya kaṇṭhe na lagati sa mriyata ityetayoḥ parasparamasaṅa‍gaterayamasaṅa‍gatirnāma virodhaḥ ||
goṭhṭhaühīti | goṣṭhe | ṇokkhī apūrvā | kāvi visagaṇṭhi kāpi viṣagranthiḥ | ‘romāñcādayastriyām’ iti strīliṅa‍gatā | pacelliṃu pratyuta | viṣagrantheḥ kaṇṭhasaṃbandhena mārakatvaṃ pratītam | varṇyamānāyā rūpasya tathābhūtasyaiveti vyakto virodhaḥ ||
pratyanīkaṃ yathā—
‘utkaṇṭhā saṃtāpo raṇaraṇako jāgarastanostanutā |
phalamidamaho mayāptaṃ sukhāya mṛgalocanāṃ dṛṣṭvā || 63 ||
atra mṛgalocanādarśanasyaiva kila nirvṛtiḥ phalam | mayā tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvāntastāpādikaṃ mayāptamiti pratyanīkaphalatvādayaṃ pratyanīkākhyo virodhaḥ ||
atra mṛgalocanādarśanasyaiveti | yadyapyekasya viruddhaṃ kāryakāritvaṃ na viruddhaṃ, tathāpi yayaiva pravṛttyā kiṃcitkāryaṃ kartumudyato na tayaiva tadviruddhaṃ karoti tadetatsukhāyeti caturthyā dyotyate || ﻿
adhiko yathā—
‘eko dāśarathiḥ kāmaṃ yātudhānāḥ sahasraśaḥ |
te tu yāvanta evājau tāvadvā dadṛśe sa taiḥ || 64 ||’
atraikasya dāśaratheranekasaṃkhyairyātudhānairyatsamarakarma tatra tairasya tāvadvā dṛś‍yamānatvenaikasaṃkhyāviruddhamādhikyaṃ gamyata ityayamadhikākhyo virodhaḥ ||
viṣamaṃ yathā—
‘diśāmalīkālakabhaṅa‍gatāṃ gatastrayīvadhūkarṇatamālapallavaḥ |
cakāra yasyādhvaradhūmasaṃcayo malīmasaḥ śuklataraṃ bhavadyaśaḥ || 65 ||’
atra malīmasādhvaradhūmasaṃcayena yadyaśasaḥ śuklīkaraṇaṃ tadyadyādṛśādeva jāyate tattādṛgeva bhavatīti prasiddhervaiṣamyātparasparamasaṅa‍gaterayaṃ viṣamākhyo virodhaḥ ||
sāmagryekadeśasadbhāvamātreṇa kāryasadbhāve sthite virodhacchāyāmūlatvamiti tada- nantaraṃ saṃbhavaḥ prāptāvasara ityāha—
prabhūtakaraṇālokātsyādevamiti saṃbhavaḥ |
sa vidhau vā niṣedhe vā dvaye vā na dvaye 'pi vā || 25 ||
prabhūteti | bhūyāṃsi kāraṇāni dṛṣṭvā kāryamutpatsyate nāpi daivātkadācinna syāditi jñānasaṃbhavaḥ | na cāyaṃ saṃśaya eva nahi syādvā naveti dolāyate | nāpi vitarko vyāpyāropasyābhāvāt | kva tarhyayamantarbhavati na kvacit, jñānāntarasyevocyamānatvāt, aniścayarūpatāmātreṇa tatrāntarbhāve 'tiprasaṅa‍gāt, nāpi bhrāntirnyagbhūtabādhapuraḥ saratvāt | bhrāntau tu siddhāyāṃ bādhotpattiriti vakṣyate 'sa vidhau vā niṣedhe vā' iti | saṃbhavo viṣayaniyato vidhiniṣedhobhayānubhayarūpaścaturvidho viṣayaḥ | apravṛttapravartanaṃ dvirūpam | prayojakagataṃ prayojyagataṃ ca | ādyaṃ pratyuktyākhye śabdālaṃkāre vidhidvāreṇetyanenoktam, dvitīyaṃ tu bhūtabhavanalakṣaṇamihocyate | saṃprasaktasyābhāvo niṣedhaḥ | etenobhayānubhayarūpau vyākhyātau || ﻿
eṣu vidhiviṣayo yathā—
‘tvayyādātuṃ jalamavanate śārṅgiṇo varṇacaure tasyāḥ sindhoḥ pṛthumapi tanuṃ dūrabhāvātpravāham |
prekṣiṣyante gaganagatayo nūnamāvarjya dṛṣṭī- rekaṃ muktāguṇamiva bhuvaḥ sthūlamadhyendranīlam || 66 ||’
atra tvayi jalamādātumavanate sati tasyāḥ saritaḥ pravāho madhyaniviṣṭendranīlamaṇirmuktāguṇa iva gaganagatiprekṣaṇīyo bhaviṣyatīti vidheḥ saṃbhāvyamānatvādayaṃ vidhiviṣayaḥ saṃbhavaḥ ||
atra tvayi jalamiti | aprekṣaṇīyasya prekṣaṇīyatābhavanaṃ vidhiḥ ||
niṣedhaviṣayo yathā—
‘parasya bhūyānvivare 'bhiyogaḥ prasahya saṃrakṣaṇamātmarandhre |
bhīṣme 'pyasaṃbhāvyamidaṃ gurau vā na saṃbhavatyeva vanecareṣu || 67 ||’
atredaṃ bhīṣmadroṇayorasaṃbhāvyamānaṃ dhanurvedakauśalamasminvanecare na saṃbhavatīti niṣedhaviṣayaḥ saṃbhavaḥ ||
asminvanecara iti | paravivarābhiyoge svavivararakṣārūpabahutarakāraṇālokānnāyaṃ vanecara iti niṣedha eva saṃbhāvyate ||
vidhiniṣedhaviṣayo yathā—
‘utpaś‍yāmi drutamapi sakhe matpriyārthaṃ yiyāsoḥ kālakṣepaṃ kakubhasurabhau parvate parvate te |
muktāpāṅa‍gaiḥ sajalanayanaiḥ svāgatīkṛtya kekāḥ pratyudyātaḥ kathamapi bhavāngantumāśu vyavasyet || 68 ||
atra drutamapi yiyāsoḥ kālakṣepaṃ tavotpaś‍yāmīti vidhirūpaḥ kathamapi na bhavān gantumāśu vyavasyediti niṣedharūpastadevaṃ vidhiniṣedhayorasaṃbhāvyamānatvādayamubhayaviṣayaḥ saṃbhavaḥ || 3 || ﻿
kālakṣepaṃ tavotpaś‍yāmīti | utpaś‍yāmi saṃbhāvayāmi | akālakṣepavataḥ kālakṣepabhavanaṃ vidhiḥ | kathamapīti kākūpasthito gamanābhāvo niṣedhaḥ | na ca vācyaṃ dvāvatra saṃbhavau | tathā ca naiko 'pyubhayaviṣaya iti | yato yaiva kālakṣepasāmagrī saiva śuklāpāṅa‍gairityādi kāraṇasahakṛtā niṣedhamapi viṣayīkaroti | ataḥ saṃbhavabhedenaṃ kiṃcitpramāṇamiti ||
anubhayaviṣayo yathā—
‘tasyāḥ pātuṃ suragaja iva vyomni pūrvārdhalambī tvaṃ cedacchasphaṭikaviśadaṃ tarkayestiryagambhaḥ |
saṃsarpantyāḥ sadasi bhavataḥ srotasi cchāyayā sā syādasthānopagatayamunā saṃgamenābhirāmā || 69 ||’
atra yadi tvamevaṃ kuryāstadaivaṃ syāditi vidhiniṣedhayoranavagaterayamanubhayaviṣayaḥ saṃbhavaḥ ||
atra yadi tvamevaṃ kuryā iti | na tāvadatrābhāvaḥ pratīyata iti na niṣedhasaṃbhavaḥ | vidhisaṃbhavo 'pi nāsti | yo hi vyavasthitakāraṇadarśanena vyavasthitasyaiva bhavanasya saṃbhavaḥ sa vidhisaṃbhavaśabdenābhidhīyate, naceha tathā | tadidamuktaṃ anavagateriti ||
etena vidhiniṣedhayorvikalpaviṣayo 'pi vyākhyātaḥ | yathā—
‘yadi bhavati mukhānāṃ vākpaṭūnāṃ sahasraṃ nirupamamavadhānaṃ jīvitaṃ cātidīrgham |
kamalamukhi tathāpi kṣmāpatestasya kartuṃ sakalaguṇavicāraḥ śak‍yate vā naveti || 70 ||’
tadetannigadenaiva vyākhyātam ||
tadetannigadeneti | parasparavyabhicāriṇorekatra saṃbhāvyamānatvāditi vyaktau vikalpa ityarthaḥ || ﻿
pūrveṣāṃ saṃbhavalakṣaṇamupanyasya dūṣayati—
droṇasya saṃbhavaḥ khāryāṃ śate pañcāśato yathā |
tathānye saṃbhavaṃ prāhuḥ so 'numānānna bhidyate || 26 ||
bhidyate tu yadyaniścayaḥ syāt |
droṇasyeti | samudāyajñānādekadeśajñānasaṃbhava iti prācyānāmabhiprāyaḥ | tathā ca samudāyasya samudāyivyāptatvādiyaṃ khārī droṇavatī khārītvāditi sulabham | anumāna evāsyāntarbhāva ityarthaḥ | kathaṃ tarhi tavāpi saṃbhavo bhidyate sāmagrī kāryavyāpteti tatrāpyanumānameva bhaviṣyatītyata āha—bhidyata iti | nahi sāmagrī dṛṣṭā yataḥ kāryamanumīyate, kiṃtu prabhūtakāraṇadarśanena kāryasya jñānamanyadevotpadyata iti vaktavyam | tathā cāsmākaṃ darśane yuktaḥ pṛthagbhāvaḥ ||
yastūdāharaṇaviśeṣaṃ na pratisaṃdhatte taṃ bodhayitumudāharaṇāntaramāha—
yathā—
‘ruddhāpāṅa‍gaprasaramalakairañjanasnehaśūnyaṃ pratyādeśādapi ca madhuno vismṛtabhrūvilāsam |
tvayyāsanne nayanamuparispandi śaṅa‍ke mṛgākṣyā mīnakṣobhākulakuvalayaśrītulāmeṣyatīti || 71 ||’
atra yathā khāryāṃ droṇaḥ śate pañcāśaditi niyamo naivaṃ vipralambhe 'lakānāmakalpanamanañjanamakṣṇormadhuno vā pratyādeśaḥ, suhṛdudantalābhārambhe vā nayanaspandanāni, saṃbhāvyante ca prabhūtakāraṇalokādityeṣo 'pi vidhirūpa eva saṃbhava iti ||
rūddhāpāṅa‍getyādi | evaṃ viśleṣaduḥkhena karśitā yathā 'cetanāmapyalakānāṃ karuṇotpannaiva lakṣyate | tasmādiyaṃ mā jaladharaṃ drākṣīditi nisargacapalasyāpāṅa‍gasya prasaramavarundhanti | snehapadena nayanāñjanayoranupadhiranubandho vyajyate | tena mitho maitrīyogyatvam | tena tannayanādanyatra nāñjanaṃ kāntimāpnotīti ko 'pi lāvaṇyaprakarṣastathābhūtasyāpyañjanasya tyāge yadekatānatayā nātmānamapi pratisaṃdhātuṃ samartheti vyanakti | evaṃ saṃpadāntareṣvapi svaraso 'nusaṃdheyaḥ | vipralambharūpakāraṇālokāccopari-
nayanaspandanaṃ saṃbhāvyata iti saṃbhavadvayamatreti vyākhyānena sphuṭayati—atra yathā khāryāmiti ||
parasparopakārakayorekasya viśeṣaṃ dṛṣṭvāparasya viśeṣo jñāyata iti saṃbhavasāmyātta- danantaramanyonyalakṣaṇamāha—
anyonyamupakāro yastadanyonyaṃ tridhā ca tat |
vācyaṃ pratīyamānaṃ ca tṛtīyamubhayātmakam || 27 ||
anyonyacūlikānyobhrāntiranyonyamekatā |
anyonyālaṃkṛterantastrayametadiheṣyate || 28 ||
anyonyamiti | viśeṣārpaṇamupakāro na ceyaṃ parivṛttiḥ sthitasyānapanayanāt dānapratidānābhāvācca | viśeṣastu nānārūpastadvākyārthībhūtarasānugāmitayā tatra tatronnīyate | vibhāgaṃ darśayati—tridheti | abhidhīyamānaṃ viśeṣataḥ śabdenopāttaṃ sāmānyataḥ śabdena viṣayīkṛtaṃ viśeṣatastu pratīyamānamevetyubhayātmakam | dvābhyāmanyato 'pratīyamānam | anyānyacūlikādilakṣaṇāni granthakāra eva sphuṭīkariṣyati ||
teṣvabhidhīyamānamanyonyamiha yathā—
‘kaṇṭhasya tasya stanabandhurasya muktākalāpasya ca nistalasya |
anyonyaśobhājananādbabhūva sādhāraṇo bhūṣaṇabhūṣyabhāvaḥ || 72 ||’
atrānyonyaśobhājananetyādinopakāryopakārakabhāvasya dvayorapyabhihitatvādabhidhīyamānamidamanyonyam ||
kaṇṭhasyeti | bandhuro namraḥ | nistalo vartulaḥ ||
pratīyamānaṃ yathā—
‘uddhaccho piaï jalaṃ jaha jaha viralaṅa‍gulī ciraṃ pahio |
pāāvaliā vi taha taha dhāraṃ taṇuampi taṇueī || 73 ||’
[uddharṣaḥ pibati jalaṃ yathā yathā viralāṅa‍guliściraṃ pathikaḥ |
prapāpālikāpi tathā tathā dhārāṃ tanumapi tanūkaroti ||]
﻿
atra pathikaprapāpālikayormitho 'nurāge yadekasya viralāṅa‍gulinā kareṇa pānīyapānamanyasyāḥ sutarāṃ vāridhārātanūkaraṇaṃ tena parasparamupakāryopakārakabhāvātpratīyamānamidamanyonyam ||
atra pathiketi | mitho 'nurāga ityanena parasparānurāgasaṃvardhanamevātra viśeṣārpaṇamiti matam | tathā hi karasya viralāṅa‍gulikaraṇe kathamahametāṃ cirāya paś‍yāmīti prapāpālikābhiprāya eva vardhito bhavati | evamapi vāridhārātanūkaraṇe boddhavyam | na cāyamevaṃvidho 'rthaḥ kenāpi śabdenābhihita iti bhavati pratīyamānatā vaktṛpratipādyādiviśeṣaparyālocanenaiva dhvananamunmiṣati ||
pratīyamānābhighīyamānaṃ yathā—
‘golāvisamoāracchaleṇa appā urammi se mukko |
aṇuampāṇiddosaṃ teṇa vi sā gāḍhamuaụ̄dhā || 74 ||’
[godāviṣamāvatāracchalena ātmā urasi asya muktaḥ |
anukampānirdoṣaṃ tenāpi sā gāḍhamupagụ̄dhā ||]
atra godāvarīviṣamāvatāravyājena tayā tasyorasi ātmā kṣiptastenāpyanukampā nirdoṣā sā gāḍhamupagụ̄dhetyabhidhīyamānaḥ parasparamanurāgādupakāryopakārakabhāvaḥ pratīyata ityubhayātmakamidamanyonyam ||
atra godāvarīti | pūrvavatpratīyamāno 'pi parasparamupakārasthalenānukampānirdoṣaśabdābhyāmabhidhayā spṛś‍yata ityubhayarūpam | na ca śabdopātte kiṃ dhvananeneti vācyam | bhinnaviṣayatvāt ||
anyonyacūḍikā yathā—
‘śaśinā ca niśā niśayā ca śaśī śaśinā niśayā ca yathā gaganam |
bhavatā ca sabhā sabhayā ca bhavān sabhayā bhavatā ca tathā bhuvanam || 75 ||’
atra niśāśaśinoḥ sabhābhavatośca parasparamupakāryopakārakabhāve vartamānayoryadidaṃ gaganaṃ jagatī ca prasiddhayorupakārakatvacūḍikevoparyupari labhyate seyamanyonyacūḍikā | ﻿
atra niśāśaśinoriti | cūḍikā śikhā | sā yathā śarīratadavayavebhyo bhinnaivopalakṣyate tathātrāpi niśāśaśinoḥ sabhābhavatoḥ parasparamupakārakatvamabhisaṃdhāya dvayordvayorgaganajagatī pratyupakārakatvamanyadevābhidhīyate | na caitāvataiva viśeṣeṇa pṛthagbhāvo 'nyonyālaṃkārakavalīkṛtasyaiva tasya saṃbhavāt ||
anyonyabhrāntiryathā—
‘jambūnāṃ kusumotkare navamadhunyārabdhapānotsavāḥ kīrāḥ pakvaphalāśayā madhukarīścumbanti muñcanti ca |
‘eteṣāmapi nīlakiṃśukadalairebhiḥ samānatviṣāṃ puṣpabhrāntibhirāpatanti sahasā cañcūṣu bhṛṅa‍gāṅa‍ganāḥ || 76 ||’
atra jambūkusumakuñjasthitamadhukarīṣu śukaśakuntānāṃ yā pakvajambūphalabhrāntiryā ca madhukarīṇāṃ śukacañcuṣu kiṃśukakusumabhrāntiḥ seyamanyonyabhrāntiranyonyasmādapṛthageva ||
atra jambūkusumeti | na hi taimirikakeśapratyayavadbhrānteralaṃkāratāpi tadbhūtasādṛś‍yamūlāyā eva | tathā ca camatkārivastvantaropamāparyavasāyitvamiti bhrāntisaṃsarga eva viśeṣārpaṇa upakāraḥ | anyonyavacanena parasparagāmitā tasya tenaiva darśitetyanyonyalakṣaṇāśleṣātkathaṃ pṛthagbhavatīti | etenānyonyaikatā vyākhyātā ||
anyonyātmakatā yathā—
‘praphullatāpicchanibhairabhīṣubhiḥ śubhaiśca saptacchadapāṃsupāṇḍubhiḥ |
paraspareṇa cchuritāmalacchavī tadekavarṇāviva tau babhūvatuḥ || 77 ||’
atra ś‍yāmapāṇḍutayoḥ parasparavyatirekeṇaikavarṇakaraṇādanyonyamekatā nāma bhrāntibhedo 'nyonyātpṛthageva ||
parasparanirūpyatāsāmyātkramaprāptāṃ parivṛttiṃ nirūpayati—
vyatyayo vastuno yastu yo vā vinimayo mithaḥ |
parivṛttirihoktā sā kāvyālaṃkāralakṣaṇe || 29 ||
﻿
vyatyaya iti | vastusthitiviparyāsavacanaṃ parivṛttiriti sphuṭameva lakṣaṇam ||
sā tridhā vyatyayavatī tathā vinimayātmikā |
tṛtīyā cobhayavatī nirdiṣṭā kāvyasūribhiḥ || 30 ||
sā tridhā-ekasthānasthitasya vastunaḥ sthānāntaraprāptivacanena, dānapratidānavacanena, ubhayavacanena vā | tadāha—sā tridheti ||
sarvatra mukhyavṛttyā gauṇavṛttivyapāśrayeṇa vā tathābhāvoktiriti ṣaṭa‍prakāratvaṃ darśayati—
tridhāpi cāsau mukhyāmukhyabhedāddvidhābhūya ṣọdhā saṃpadyate |
tāsu vyatyayavatī mukhyā yathā—
‘kumudavanamapaśri śrīmadambhojaṣaṇḍaṃ tyajati mudamulūkaḥ prītimāṃścakravākaḥ |
udayamahimaraś‍miryāti śītāṃśurastaṃ hatavidhilasitānāṃ hī vicitro vipākaḥ || 78 ||’
atra yatkumudavanādīnāmapaśrīkatvādikaṃ yaccāmbhojakhaṇḍādīnāṃ śrīmattvādikaṃ mukhyameva prātarupalabhyate, seyaṃ vyatyayavatī mukhyā nāma parivṛttiḥ ||
tridhāpi cāsāviti | kumudavanamiti | kumudavanādulūkāddhimaraś‍meḥ śrīmattvaṃ prītirudayaścāpasṛtāni prāptāni punarambhojakhaṇḍacakravākīhimāṃśūnāmitivyakto vyatyayaḥ | mukhyatvaṃ grantha eva vyaktam ||
vyatyayavatyamukhyā yathā—
‘jo tīa ahararāo rattiṃ uvvāsio piaameṇa |
soccia dīsaï gose savattiṇaaṇesu saṅa‍kanto || 79 ||’
[yastasyā adhararāgo rātrāvudvāsitaḥ priyatamena |
sa eva dṛś‍yate prātaḥ sapatnīnayaneṣu saṃkrāntaḥ ||]
atra priyatamena rātrāvudvāsitasyādhararāgasyeyaṃ sapatnīlocaneṣu saṃkrāntiḥ || ﻿
atra priyatameneti | tāmbūlādihetuko 'nya evādhararāgo 'nyaśca matsarahetukaḥ kaṣāyatālakṣaṇo nayanagāmīti tayorabhedādhyavasāyo yattatpadābhyāṃ pratīta iti gauṇī vṛttiḥ | prakāśate ca śabdavṛttyādharasthānasthitasya nayanasthānaprāptiriti tāvataivālaṃkāranirvāhaḥ ||
vinimayavatī mukhyā yathā—
‘praścyotanmadasurabhīṇi nimnagāyāḥ krīḍanto gajapatayaḥ payāṃsi kṛtvā |
kiñjalkavyavahitatāmradānalekhai- rutteruḥ sarasijagandhibhiḥ kapolaiḥ || 80 ||’
atra karikapolamadāmodasyāmbhojarajaḥ parimalasya ca saritsaliladvipakapolapālyormukhyatvenaiva parasparopakaraṇādiyaṃ vinimayavatī mukhyā nāma parivṛttiḥ ||
atra karikapoleti | gajendrāṇāṃ madayāsamacandrakayoḥ(?) svāśritayornadīṣu saṃkrāmaṇaṃ nadīsthitayośca kiñjalkāmbhojaparimalayorgrahaṇaṃ tena dānapratidānavattayā vinimayo bhavati ||
vinimayavatyamukhyā yathā—
‘tasya ca pravayaso jaṭāyuṣaḥ svargiṇaḥ kimiha śocyate 'dhunā |
yena jarjarakalevaravyayātkrītamindukiraṇojjvalaṃ yaśaḥ || 81 ||’
atra jarjarakalevaraṃ datvā śaśikiraṇaśubhraṃ yaśaḥ krītamityamukhyayaiva vṛttyā vinimayokteramukhyeyaṃ vinimayavatī parivṛttiḥ ||
atra jarjareti | mūlyārpaṇakrayaṇayoratra bādhāvdyakta evopacāraḥ, śabdavṛttistu pūrvavadeva kuṇṭhaiveti bhavati vinimayaḥ ||
ubhayavatī mukhyā yathā—
‘locanādharakṛtāhṛtarāgā vāsitānanaviśeṣitagandhā |
vāruṇī paraguṇātmaguṇānāṃ vyatyayaṃ vinimayaṃ ca vitene || 82 ||’
﻿
atra vāruṇyā yadadharādrāgo 'pahṛtya cakṣuṣornikṣiptasteneyaṃ vyatyayavatī, yacca mukhāmodavāsitayā svāmodena mukhāmodo viśeṣitastena vinimayavatī | tadiyamubhayathāpi mukhyavṛttyaivokteti mukhyeyamubhayavatī parivṛttiḥ ||
locanādhareti | locanādharayoryathāsaṃkhyaṃ kṛta āhṛto rāgo yayā tena locane kṛto 'dharādapanīta iti vyatyayaḥ | vāsite ānane viśeṣito gandho yasyāḥ sā tathā | tena tayā mukhaṃ vāsitaṃ mukhena ca seti bhavati vinimayaḥ | paraguṇātmaguṇānāmiti | paraguṇānāmiti paraguṇānāṃ vyatyayaḥ, ātmaguṇānāṃ vinimaya iti saṃbandhaḥ | kartṛtvamutprekṣitaṃ tadetaddarśayati—atreti ||
ubhayavatyamukhyā yathā—
‘kiṃ catraṃ yadi devena bhūbhṛtaḥ karadīkṛtāḥ |
devo 'pi dāpitaḥ kiṃ tairna punaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ karam || 83 ||’
atra bhūbhṛtāmakaradānāṃ yatkarapradānaṃ jigīṣośca yatpṛṣṭhe hastanikṣepaḥ sa eva dravyaguṇādīnāṃ sthānādiparivṛttau vyatyayo, yacca devena bhūbhṛtaḥ karadīkṛtāḥ devo 'pi taiḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ karaṃ dāpita iti so 'yaṃ dānapratipādanalakṣaṇo 'pi vinimaya ityetadubhayamapīha śliṣṭapadābhidheyatvādamukhyavṛttyaivocyamānamupalabhyata ityubhayavatīyamamukhyā parivṛttiḥ ||
ekatra pratītasyānyatra pratyayaḥ parivṛttau; tathā nidarśane 'pīti tadanantaraṃ nida- rśanaṃ lakṣayati—
dṛṣṭāntaḥ proktasiddha‍yai yaḥ siddhe 'rthe tannidarśanam |
pūrvottarasamatve tadṛju vakraṃ ca kathyate || 31 ||
dṛṣṭānta iti | proktasya prākaraṇikasya siddhirniścayaḥ | nanvanumānāṅa‍gamapi dṛṣṭāntābhidhānaṃ pṛthagalaṃkāraḥ syādityata āha—siddhe 'rtha iti | siddha evārthe kaṃcidviśeṣamāvedayituṃ dṛṣṭāntoktirnidarśanam, sādhye tvarthe 'numānamiti vibhāgaḥ | pūrvaṃ dārṣṭāntikoktiṃ samāpya paścāddṛṣṭāntoktiriti dvitīyaḥ | ekayaivoktyā dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayoriti tṛtīyaḥ | tadāha—pūrvottarasamatva iti | yatra śabdata ﻿
eva tulyetivṛttatā dṛṣṭāntadarṣṭāntikayoranugamyate tadṛju nidarśanam | yatra tu paryavasitāyāmuktau sahṛdayaparyālocanayā tadvakram | tadetadāha—ṛju vakraṃ ceti | tena nidarśanasya ṣaḍ bhedāḥ ||
teṣu pūrvamṛju yathā—
‘udayanneva savitā padmeṣvarpayati śriyam |
vibhāvayati bhūtīnāṃ phalaṃ suhṛdanugrahaḥ || 84 ||’
atra ṛjūttk‍yaiva pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ paścāddārṣṭāntikaṃ pradarśitamitīdamṛ- jupūrvaṃ ca nidarśanaṃ sūryadṛṣṭāntena vibhūtīnāṃ suhṛdanugrahaḥ phalamiti jñāpayati ||
sūryadṛṣṭānteneti | ṛddhibhiḥ suhṛdanugṛhyata iti siddho 'rthaḥ, kiṃtu tadetadeva tāsāṃ phalamiti viśeṣamabhidhātuṃ sūryadṛṣṭāntopanyāsaḥ | atra samṛddhatāphalaṃ suhṛttvamanugrahatvaṃ ceti śabdata eva sūryādiṣu dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikābhimateṣu pratīyata iti ṛjutvamityarthaḥ ||
tadevaṃ vakraṃ yathā—
‘pāṇaüḍī avi jaliuṇa huavaho jalaï jaṇṇavāummī |
ṇahu te parihariavvā visamadasāsaṇṭhiā purisā || 85 ||’
[pānakuṭīmapi jvālayitvā hutavaho jvalati yajñavāṭamapi |
nahi te parihartavyā viṣamadaśāsaṃsthitāḥ puruṣāḥ ||]
atrāpi pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ paścāddārṣṭāntikam | kiṃtu yathā pūrvatrodayamānaḥ savitā suhṛtpadmeṣu śriyamarpayatīti tulyetivṛttatā ṛjūktyā śabdenaivābhidhīyate, naivamatra kiṃ tarhi jvalanetivṛttena tulyaṃ tattu tatpuruṣāṇāmitivṛttamaśābdaṃ yukticāturyātpratīyate tadidaṃ pūrvaṃ ca vakraṃ nidarśanam ||
pāṇaüḍīti | pāṇapadaṃ mlecchadeśīyam | pāne kuṭī śauṇḍikakuṭī vā | atrāpīti | dṛṣṭānte 'pi pānakuṭījvalanādikaṃ viśeṣaṇamupāttam | ca ca taddārṣṭā-﻿
ntike saṃbhavati śabdena vā pratyāyyate; kiṃtu bimbapratibimbanyāyenātra bhavati | tathā hi yathā pānakuṭyāṃ hutavahasya jvalanaṃ yajñavāṭe ca tathā 'vyavasthitacittatayā grāmīṇāvidagdhayuvatiprasakto bhūtvānyatra nāgarikāsu vidagdhāsu rajyate so 'pi na tyājya ityukticāturyāttulyetivṛttatā gamyate 'to vakratvamityāha—kiṃtu yatheti ||
uttaramṛju yathā—
‘hiaa tiracchīyaï saṃmuhapacchā gahiakaḍakkhāssa |
pahia ekkejje goraḍī ṇaṃ caühaṭṭa uvaccha || 83 ||’
[hṛdaye tiraścīnā saṃmukhaprāptā paścādgṛhītakaṭākṣāsya |
pathikasyaikaiva gauratarā nanu catuṣpathe vrajati ||]
atra ṛjūttkyā śabda evābhidhīyamānasādharmyaṃ dārṣṭāntikamabhidhāyottarakālaṃ dṛṣṭānto 'bhihitastadidamuttaramṛju nidarśanam ||
hiaeti | vicchittipathikasyābhilāṣitā yā yoṣitsā ekaiva | hṛdaye smaraṇārụ̄dhā satī lagnā ataeva tiracchīyaï tiryak‌śalyāyamānā pathikasaṃmukhābhimukhasya tasya calitatvāt | paścācca gṛhītakaṭākṣā paścādbhūtena gṛhītaścamatkṛtaḥ kaṭākṣo yasyāḥ | ekkejje ekaiva | jiravadhāraṇe | ṇaṃ nanu catuṣyathe kaścitsaṃmukhatāṃ kaścittiraścīnatāṃ kaścitpaścādbhāvaṃ dhatte; gaurī tu pathikasyaikaiva tatheti | atra ṛjūttkyā śabdata eveti | tiryaktvādīnāmubhayagāmināṃ śabdenopādānātpratītimātreṇa cālaṃkāranirvāhaḥ ||
tadeva vakraṃ yathā—
‘upari ghanaṃ ghanapaṭalaṃ dūre dayitā kimetadāpatitam |
himavati divyauṣadhayaḥ kopāviṣṭaḥ phaṇī śirasi || 87 ||’
atrāpi dārṣṭāntikamabhidhāyottarakālameva dṛṣṭānto vihitastadidamuttaraṃ ṛju nidarśanam; kiṃtu yathā pūrvasmin hṛdaye tiryagityādibhiḥ śabda eva ṛjūktyā sādharmyābhidhānam, naivamatra tathā; api tu kimetadāpatitamityukticāturyeṇa viparyayeṇa ca liṅa‍gasaṃkhyā yathāsaṃkhyānām | tadetaduttaraṃ vakraṃ ca nidarśanam | ﻿
api tu kimetadāpatitamityukticāturyeṇeti | nanu ca uparītyanena vyavadhānamupāttaṃ dṛṣṭānte 'pi śabda eva pratiphalati tatkathaṃ vakratvamityata āha—viparyayeṇeti | ghanapaṭalaṃ napuṃsakam, phaṇī pumān, dayitā caikavacanavatī, oṣadhayo bahuvacanāliṅi‍gatāḥ | ghanapaṭalaṃ pūrvaṃ dārṣṭāntikamupakramya dṛṣṭāntoktau na pūrvaṃ phaṇī nirdiṣṭaḥ | tato liṅa‍gasaṃkhyānāṃ viparyayo bhavati, tadayamarthena śabdata evopari paryavasthānaṃ dūratvaṃ ca dṛṣṭāntayoḥ pratīyate; śirasi himavatītyetābhyāmanyathākāraṃ bodhitatvāt | phalatastu sa evārtha iti vakrataiveti |
samamṛju yathā—
‘yāti candrāṃśubhiḥ spṛṣṭā dhvāntarājī parābhavam |
sadyo rājaviruddhānāṃ darśayantī durantatām || 88 ||’
atra rājaviruddhānāmiti śliṣṭapadena darśayantīti vartamānakālalakṣaṇātsadya iti taddhitena ca samakālameva dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayoḥ śabdato ṛjūktyaivoktatvādidamṛju samaṃ ca nidarśanam |
yatīti | rājā candro nṛpatiśca | tadanayoḥ śliṣṭoktiviṣayatayā na pūrvāparabhāvo vibhāvyate | candrāṃśuparābhūtadhvāntarājīnṛpativiruddhadurantayorapi darśayantīti śatrā, sadya iti taddhitena ca samatvam | kiṃtu dhvāntarājī parabhavaṃ yātīti dṛṣṭāntoktau satyāṃ madhye rājaviruddhānāmiti darṣṭāntikamuktvā punarapi dṛṣṭāntaviśeṣaṇaṃ darśayantītyuktam | ataevoktikavalīkṛtatvādda‍ṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayoḥ samatvamityāśayavānvyācaṣṭe—atra rājaviruddhānāmiti |
tadeva vakraṃ yathā—
‘ṇa uṇa varakoaṇḍadaṇḍae yutimāṇusevi emea |
guṇavajjieṇa jāaï vaṃsuppaṇṇe vi ṭaṅa‍kāro || 89 ||’
[na punarvarakodaṇḍadaṇḍake putri mānuṣe 'pyevameva |
guṇavarjitena jāyate vaṃśotpanne 'pi ṭaṅa‍kāraḥ||]
atra na kevalaṃ kodaṇḍadaṇḍake mānuṣe 'pyevamevetītaretarayogavadvakratayā yugapadabhidhānaṃ guṇavarjitavaṃśotpanne 'pi ṭaṅa‍kāro na jāyata iti ﻿
śliṣṭapadatve 'pi vyatirekamukhena guṇavṛttyā cābhidhānāddhanuṣīva mānuṣe 'pi guṇavatyeva mahāñśabdo bhavatīti vakroktyā sādharmyāvagatiḥ | tadidamaśabdatvādibhiḥ pūrvādbhidyamānaṃ samaṃ vakraṃ ca nidarśanam |
ṇa uṇa vareti | guṇo dhairyādistantrī ca, vaṃśaḥ kulaṃ veṇuśca, ṭaṅa‍kāro 'vyaktānukaraṇaṃ khyātiśca | itaretarayogavaditi | tathāhi—‘tvanmukhaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ ca phulle’ ityatra phullaṃ cetītaretarayogenaikaśeṣe ekayoktyā phulleti dvābhyāṃ saṃbadhyate | tathā vināpyekaśeṣaṃ guṇavajjieṇa vaṃsuppaṇṇe ṭaṅa‍kāra iti yugapadanvīyante | nanu yathā rājaviruddhānāmityatra śeṣeṇa ṛjutvaṃ tathātrāpi bhaviṣyatītyata āha—śliṣṭapadatve 'pīti | dhanuṣīva mānuṣe 'pi mahāñśabdo bhavatīti vivakṣitam | na ca vyatirekamukhenopanaye 'yamarthaḥ śabdādavagamyate, pratīyate cārtha iti yuktaṃ vakratvam | nanu vyatirekeṇaiva kathaṃ na tulyavṛttitā saṃmatetyata āha—guṇavṛttyā ceti | satyametattathāpi dvayorvarṇanīyayorguṇādikayorabhedādhyavasāyo vaktavyaḥ | tathā gauṇavṛttivyapāśrayeṇaiva vakratvam | tadidamuktaṃ vyatirekamukhena guṇavṛttyā ceti |
vyatirekaṃ vinā dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikabhāvābhāvāvdyaद्वाभ्यामिति युक्तं प्रतिभाति ।tirekābhyāṃ tallakṣaṇamāha—
śabdopātte pratīte vā sādṛśye vastunordvayoḥ |
bhedābhidhānaṃ bhedaśca vyatirekaśca kathyate || 32 ||
śabdopātta iti | bhedābhidhānaṃ vaidharmyakathanam | evaṃ cet merusarṣapayorapitathābhidhānamalaṃkāraḥ syādata uktam—sādṛśye vastunoriti | upamānopameyayorityarthaḥ | sādṛśyaṃ dvidhā | śabdopāttaṃ pratītaṃ ca | aśabdopāttamapi dhvananānumānādibhiravagamyata iti na virodhastadidamuktam—pratīte veti | tadayamarthaḥ—udbhūtacamatkārisādṛśyayorvairasyoktirvyatirekaḥ, svarūpākhyastu pṛthag bhedo nāstyevetyuktam ||
vibhāgaṃ darśayati—
svajātivyattkyupādhibhyāmekobhayabhidā ca saḥ |
sādṛśyādvaisādṛśyācca bhitraḥ ṣọdhābhijāyate || 33 ||
svajātīyeti | yena rūpeṇa vaiyatirekyamupādīyate tadrūpavantaṃ vyatirekaprati-﻿
yoginaṃ parikalpya tato vyatireko 'pīti svajātivyatirekaḥ prathamaḥ prakāraḥ | dvitīyastu saiva vyaktirvidharmeti | etatprakāradvayaṃ yathāsaṃkhyamabhidhīyamānasādṛśyayoriti mūlabhedadvayaṃ tathaivāparamekānekalakṣaṇaṃ prakāradvayaṃ tatraivānyatsādṛśyavaisādṛśyarūpaṃ dvayamiti krameṇa ṣọdhā bhedo vivakṣitaḥ | yathā ca svajātivyatireṃkayoḥ pratīyamānābhidhīyamānasādṛśyagāmitā na saṃbhavati tathāgre vakṣyate ||
tatra śabdopāttasādṛśye svajātivyatireko yathā—
‘aratnālokasaṃhāryamavāryaṃ sūryaraśmibhiḥ |
dṛṣṭirodhakaraṃ yūnāṃ yauvanaprabhavaṃ tamaḥ || 90 ||’
atra yauvanaprabhavasya tamasastamojātyā saha dṛṣṭirodhakaramiti sādṛśyamuktvā, aratnālokasaṃhāryamavāryaṃ sūryaraśmibhiriti vyatireko vihitaḥ, so 'yaṃ svajātivyatirekaḥ ||
atra yauvanaprabhavasyeti | yauvanakṛtamajñānalakṣaṇamanyadeva tamo 'nyaccāndhakārarūpaṃ tayostadbhāvāpattiriyameva kalpanāsmābhiruktā | anena tu prakāreṇa rasaḥ puṣyatītyalaṃkāramadhye gaṇanam ||
pratīyamānasādṛśye svavyaktivyatireko yathā—
‘aṇṇoṇṇehiṃ sucariasaahiṃ aṇudiṇa vaḍ̣dhiia māṇu |
appaṇavi ṇa hu mahuvi aha appāṇeṇa samāṇu || 91 ||’
[anyonyaiḥ sucaritaśatairanudinaṃ vardhate mānaḥ |
asyāpi na khalu mahānapi athātmanā samānaḥ ||]
atra pratīyamānopamānasādṛśyopacaritabhedādātmavyakteranyairanyaiśca sucaritaśataiḥ svavyaktita eva bhedo 'bhihitaḥ | so 'yaṃ svavyaktivyatirekaḥ ||
aṇṇoṇṇehiṃ anyonyairmāno 'haṃkāraḥ pūjā vā | yau tu kalpitabhedādhikaraṇatve- nopāttau virodhidharmavattayā śabdātpratīyeti tayorniryantraअत्र ‘निर्यत्नं णत्वा-’ इति पाठ आसीत्तत्र निर्थन्त्रणत्वादिकमिति कल्पितोऽस्ति ।ṇatvādikamiti bhavati sādṛśyaṃ pratīyamānam || ﻿
śabdopāttasādṛśya ekavyatireko yathā—
‘preyāneva vṛṣastavāpi satataṃ bhūtistavāpi sthirā durgāyā bhavatāpi bhūgharabhuvaḥ samyaggṛhītaḥ karaḥ |
nirvyājaṃ parameśvaratvamiyatā no yāsi vaktuṃ janai- rhelollāsitavāhinīśamathane yatro viṣadī bhavān || 92 ||’
atra priyavṛṣatvādibhirabhihitasādṛśyayorupamānopameyayorupameyasyaiva yathoktasādṛśyaviṣaye viṣāditvaṃ yuktamityekavyatireko 'yam ||
preyāneveti | vṛṣo gaurdharmaśca | bhūtiḥ sampad bhasma ca | durgā gaurī viṣamā ca | bhūdharabhūrgirijā parvatabhūmiśca | karo hasto rājadaṇḍaśca | vāhinīśaḥ samudraḥ senāpatiśca | viṣādī viṣabhakṣako 'vasādavāṃśca | yadyapyatrānurūpaṃ sādṛśyaṃ nāsti tathāpi śabdasādṛśyenāpyupamā pravartata eva | yathā—‘sakalaṅa‍kaṃ purametajjātaṃ saṃprati sitāṃśubimbamiva’ iti | ata evobhayālaṃkāratvamupamāyāḥ ||
sa eva pratīyamānasādṛśyo yathā—
‘sakalaṅkena jaḍena ca sāmyaṃ doṣākareṇa te kīdṛk |
abhujaṅa‍ga samanayanaḥ kathamupameyo hareṇāsi || 93 ||’
atra pratīyamānasādṛśyasya pūrvārghe candropamānasya sakalaṅa‍katādiruttarardhena varṇanīyopameyasyābhujaṅa‍gatvādirekasyaiva bhedakaḥ svadharmo 'bhihitaḥ so 'yamapyekavyatireka eva ||
sakalaṅa‍keneti | kalaṅa‍ko 'pavādo lāñchanaṃ ca | jaḍo mūrkhaḥ śītalaśca | abhujaṅa‍go na veśyāpatiravidyamānasarpaśca | samanayano yuganayanaḥ sarvān samaṃ nayatīti ca | āhlādakatvādikaṃ candreṇāniruddhaiśvaryādikaṃ parameśvareṇa sādṛśyaṃ pratīyate ||
śabdopāttasādṛśye ubhayavyatireko yathā—
‘abhinnavelau gambhīrāvamburāśirbhavānapi |
asāvañjanasaṃkāśastvaṃ ca cāmīkaradyutiḥ || 94 ||’
atra dvayorapyabhidhīyamānasādṛśyayorubhayavyatirekaḥ || ﻿
abhinneti | velā maryādā tīraṃ ca | gambhīro 'talasparśo 'calitacittavṛttiśca ||
sa eva pratīyamānasādṛśyayoryathā—
‘tvanmukhaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ ca dvayorapyanayorbhidā |
kamalaṃ jalasaṃrohi tvanmukhaṃ tvadupāśrayam || 95 ||’
tadetannigadenaiva vyākhyātam | so 'yaṃ pratīyamānasādṛśyayorubhayorvyatirekaḥ ||
abhidhīyamānasādṛśyayoḥ sadṛśavyatireko yathā—
‘tvanmukhaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ ca phulle surabhigandhinī |
bhramadbhramaramambhojaṃ loladṛṣṭi mukhaṃ tu te || 96 ||’
atra mukhāmbhojayoḥ 'phulle surabhigandhinī' iti padābhyāmabhidhīyamānasādṛśyayoḥ sadṛśameva bhramadbhramaratvaṃ loladṛṣṭitvaṃ ca bhedakamupanyastamiti so 'yaṃ śabdopāttasādṛśyayoḥ sadṛśavyatirekaḥ ||
sa eva pratīyamānasādṛśyayoryathā—
‘candro 'yamambarottaṃso haso 'yaṃ toyabhūṣaṇam |
nabho nakṣatramālīdamidamutkumudaṃ payaḥ || 97 ||’
atra pūrvārdhe candrahaṃsayoḥ pratīyamānasādṛśyayorambarottaṃsatvatoyabhūṣaṇatve, uttarārdhe tu nabhaḥpayasornakṣatramālitvotkumudatve sadṛśe eva bhedake | so 'yaṃ pratīyamānasādṛśyayoḥ sadṛśavyatirekaḥ ||
abhihitasādṛśyayorasadṛṃśavyatireko yathā—
‘śaśāma vṛṣṭirmeghānāmutsaṅa‍ge tasya bhūbhṛtaḥ |
virarāma na rāmasya dhārāsantatiraśruṇaḥ || 98 ||’
atra bhūbhṛta ityanena sākṣādupāttasādṛśyayo rāmamālyavatoryo 'yamutsaṅa‍ge samasto 'śrudhārāpāto yasya meghavṛṣṭerabhāvastadidamubhayorasadṛśameva bhedakam | so 'yamabhidhīyamānasādṛśyayorasadṛśavyatirekaḥ || ﻿
śaśāma vṛṣṭiriti | bhūbhṛto rājñaśca ||
sa eva pratīyamānasādṛśyayoryathā—
‘abhrūvilāsamaspṛṣṭamadarāgaṃ mṛgekṣaṇam |
idaṃ tu nayanadvandvaṃ tava tadguṇabhūṣitam || 99 ||’
atra kāntāmṛgekṣaṇayoḥ pratīyamānasādṛśyayorbhrūvilāsamadarāgau tadabhāvau ca visadṛśau bhedakāviti so 'yaṃ pratīyamānasādṛśyayorasadṛśavyatirekaḥ ||
sadṛśāsadṛśavyatirekābhyāmeva tadubhayavyatireko 'pi vyākhyātaḥ | yathā—
‘nirmalendu nabho reje vikacābjaṃ babhau saraḥ |
paraṃ paryaśruvadanau mamlaturbhrātarāvubhau || 100 ||’
atra nabhaḥsarasoḥ pratīyamānasādṛśyayornirmalendutvaṃ vikacābjatvaṃ ca prāgvadeva sadṛśe bhedake; tābhyāṃ ca mukhacandramukhakamalābhyāṃ manoharāhlādakatvābhyāṃ ca pratīyamānasādṛśyayoreva rāmalakṣmaṇayoryeyaṃ mukhaparyaśrutā, tanau ca mlānirnirmalendutāvirājamānayorvikacābjatvaśobhamānatvayośca sā visadṛśīti so 'yaṃ sadṛśāsadṛśabhedakatvakṛtabheda eva tadubhaya- vyatirekaḥ ||
tābhyāṃ ca mukhacandreti | mukhasya candrakamalabhāvo 'nādikavikalpanāsiddha iti tenāpi rūpeṇa pratīyamānasādṛśyatvamuktam ||
nanu mitho vyatirekabhedagaṇanamanupapatraṃ sadṛśāsadṛśavyatirekasyāpi saṃbhavā- dityata āha—
etenaikavyatirekādisaṃbhedo 'pi vyākhyātaḥ | yathā—
‘mithyā deva bhujena te 'lpavibhavaḥ kalpadrumaḥ spardhate nahyenaṃ bhuvanatrayābhayamahāsatrī kṛpāṇo 'ñcati |
﻿
tulyastatrabhavānprayāgaviṭapī yasyaitadekārṇave kāyāntarviniveśya viśvamakhilaṃ śākhāsu śete hariḥ || 101 ||’
atra varṇanīyabāhukalpadrumayorabhimataphaladāyitvādibhiḥ pratītasādṛśyayorbhuvanatrayābhayapradāyī varṇanīyabāhau kṛpāṇo bhedaka ityekavyatirekaḥ | tathā varṇanīyabāhoḥ prayāgavaṭasya ca prāgvadeva pratīyamānasādṛśyayorekasya bhuvanatrayābhayamahāsatrī kṛpāṇaḥ śākhāsu śete, anyasya tu mahāpralaye svakāyāntarniveśitārakhilaviśvo vaikuṇṭhaḥ | tāvimau tayoḥ sadṛśāveva bhedakau harikṛpāṇayorvā śyāmatādibhiḥ pratīyamānasādṛśyayorimāveva dharmau bhedakau so 'yamevaṃprakāro vyatirekasaṃkara utreyaḥ | svajātivyatireke pratīyamānasādṛśyam, svavyaktivyatireke cābhidhīyamānasādṛśyaṃ yadyudāharaṇaṃ dṛśyate saṃbhavati vā tadā tadapyudāhāryam ||
eteneti | prāgvadeveti | amimataphaladāyitvādibhiḥ | evaṃprakāra iti | na hyekavākyasthatāmātreṇa tathā camatkaroti yathāṅa‍gāṅa‍gaṅigabhāvādibhiḥ parasparagrathanayeti | saiva prakārapadenābhihitā | yadyudāharaṇaṃ dṛśyate saṃbhavati veti | na hi svajātivyatireke dvayorabhedādhyavasāyaḥ sādṛśyamantareṇa camatkāramarpayatīti kalpitameva vācyam | na ca kalpanāśabdamantareṇa pratīyamānasādṛśyasaṃbhavaḥ; sādṛśyasya bhedādhiṣṭānatvāt | svavyaktivyatireke 'pyasaṃbhavastathābhūtameva tu śabdenopādīyata iti syādata uktaṃ yadi dṛśyate iti ||
sahakāritvaṃ vyatirekanirūpyamato vyatirekānantaraṃ samāhitalakṣaṇamāha—
kāryārambhe sahāyāptirdaivādaivakṛteha yā |
ākasmikī buddhipūrvobhayī vā tatsamāhitam || 34 ||’
tatrākasmikī daivakṛtā yathā—
‘mānamasyā nirākartuṃ pādayorme patipyataḥ |
upakārāya diṣṭyedamudīrṇaṃ ghanagarjitam || 102 ||’
﻿
atra mānanirākaraṇopakrame kālotpannasyākasmikaghanagarjitasya mānavidhvaṃse sahakāritvādākasmikīyaṃ daivakṛtā sahāyasaṃpattiḥ ||
kāryārambha iti | sahāyaḥ prakṛtakāryakāraṇasya sahakārī, tenālaṃkāratā ākasmikyacintitapūrvā buddhipūrvādviparītā | ākasmikyādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ daivādaivakṛtasaṃbandhe ṣaṭprakāraṃ samāhitamityarthoktam ||
ākasmikyevādaivakṛtā yathā—
‘anuśāsatamityanākulaṃ nayavartmākulamarjunāgrajam |
svayamartha ivābhivāñchitastamabhīyāya parāśarātmajaḥ || 103 ||’
atra bhīmānuśāsanakālopakrama eva vyāsāgamanasya tadupakāritvādākasmikīyamadaivakṛtā sahāyāptiḥ ||
vyāsāgamanasyeti | vyāsena saṃpādyamānasya | tenādaivakṛteti ||
buddhipūrvā daivakṛtā yathā—
‘kalpānte śamitatrivikramamahākaṅa‍kāladaṇḍasphura- ccheṣasyūtanṛsiṃhavakranakharaprotādikolāmiṣaḥ |
viśvaikārṇavatāviśeṣamuditau tau matsyakūrmāvubhau karṣandhīvaratāṃ gataḥ syatu jaganmohaṃ mahābhairavaḥ || 104 ||’
atra pralayasamaye maheśvareṇa samāpayitumupakrāntānāṃ trivikramādīnāṃ yo 'yaṃ tadbhuvā baḍiśādinā matsyakūrmayorākarṣaṇaprakāraḥ sa bhagavatā bhairaveṇa buddhipūrvakamupakalpyamāno daivāttathābhūtaireva taiḥ saṃpadyata iti buddhipūrveyaṃ daivakṛtā sahāyāptiḥ ||
daivāttathābhūtaireveti | narasiṃhanakhādīnāṃ baḍiśādyucitamūrtiśālināṃ daivameva nimittam, baḍiśādicintā ca viṣayīkṛteti buddhipūrvatā ||
buddhipūrvā 'daivakṛtā yathā—
‘mūle pañca tataścatuṣṭayamiti sraksaṃniveśaiḥ śiraḥ- puṣpairanyatamāvalokanamitairucchoṇitairarcite |
﻿
hastasparśavaśena mūrdhni daśamaṃ mūrdhānamāropayan śaṃbhoradbhutasāhasaikarasikaḥ kairna śruto rāvaṇaḥ || 105 ||’
atra yo 'yaṃ daśavadanena svayaṃ chinnaiḥ śirobhirbhagavataḥ śaṃbhorarcanāprakāra upakrāntastatra mūle pañca tataścatuṣṭayamiti śiroviracanāprapañcobuddhipūrvako 'daivakṛtaḥ kriyamāṇo 'sya karmaṇaḥ samāptau sahakārikāraṇatāmāsādayatītyayamadaivakṛto buddhipūrvakaḥ samāhitabhedaḥ ||
mūle pañceti | adho 'dhaḥ sthūlapuṣpasya saṃniveśa uparyupari tanuriti dūrvāpūjāprakāraḥ prasiddhaḥ | anyatamālokananimittairāropitaiḥ | atra lokaprasiddhapūjāprakāraḥ kāryabhūtaḥ | uparyupari tanusaṃniveśaniṣpādanaṃ sahakāri | idaṃ ca rāvaṇaprayatnaniṣpādyatvādadaivakṛtaṃ buddhipūrvaṃ ca bhavatītyanyatamena mūrdhnānyatamasyāropaṇaṃ na navamacchedaparyantamāsīt | pūjāsvarūpeṇaiva bhagavāṃstuṣyati na tathā viditenetyabhiprāyavato nistaraṅa‍gā bhaktistena sāhasasyādbhutatvam ||
ākasmikī buddhipūrvā daivakṛtā yathā—
‘sā kaumudī nayanayorbhavataḥ sujanmā tasyā bhavānapi manorathabandhabandhuḥ |
tatsaṅa‍gamaṃ prati sakhe nahi saṃśayo 'sti yasminvidhiśca madanaśca kṛtābhiyogau || 106 ||’
atra yo 'yaṃ mādhavasya mālatīṃ prati samāgamābhilāṣastatreyaṃ mālatyā ākasmikī buddhipūrvā ca tathā pravṛttiḥ sobhayyapi daivakṛtā ca sahāyāptiḥ samāhitabhedaḥ ||
atra yo 'yaṃ mādhavasyeti | vidhiśca madanaśca kṛtābhiyogāvityanena mālatyāḥ pṛrvānubhāvāḥ kathyante | te ca dvidhā bhavantītyākasmikī daivapūrvā sahāyasaṃpattiḥ ||
ākasmikī buddhipūrvā cādaivakṛtā yathā—
‘dṛṣṭirvandanamālikā stanayugaṃ lāvaṇyapūrṇau ghaṭau śubhrāṇāṃ prakaraḥ smitaḥ sumanasāṃ vakraprabhā darpaṇaḥ |
﻿
romāñcodgama eva sarṣapakaṇaḥ pāṇī punaḥ pallavau svāṅa‍gaireva gṛhaṃ priyasya viśatastanvyā kṛtaṃ maṅa‍galam || 107 ||’
atrāgacchataḥ priyasyeyaṃ vandanamālikādimaṅa‍galakriyā manaḥparitoṣahetustasyāstanvaṅa‍gyā iṅgitākāraireva yannivartanaṃ so 'yamākasmikaḥ svabuddhipūrvakaśca tatsahakārikāraṇatvādadaivakṛtaśca samāhitabhedaḥ ||
atrāgacchataḥ priyasyeti | maṅa‍galakriyāmātraṃ na camatkārāspadamata uktaṃ manaḥparitoṣaheturiti | smitaṃ buddhipūrvam | romāñco na buddhipūrvaḥ | evaṃ dṛṣṭyādau yathāyathaṃ veditavyamiti ||
buddhipūrvāyāṃ sahāyāptau kvacidbhrāntirapyasti tatastadanantaraṃ tāṃ lakṣayati—
bhrāntirviparyayajñānaṃ dvidhā sāpi prayujyate |
atattve tattvarūpā ca tattve cātattvarūpiṇī || 35 ||
atattve tattvarūpā yā trividhā sāpi paṭhyate |
abādhitā bādhitā ca tathā kāraṇabādhitā || 36 ||
bhrāntiriti | atasmiṃstaditi niścayo bhrāntiḥ | saiva viparyayaḥ | na caivaṃ saṃśayādaya ityuktapūrvam | sā dvidhā—yasya yatrāsadbhāvastasya tatra sadbhāvāropaḥ, yasya vā yatra sadbhāvastasya tatrāsadbhāvāropaḥ | so 'yaṃ bhāvābhāvakṛto niyamo bhrānterbādhaniyame 'pi kvacidvāropanyāso bhavati kvacinna bhavati | upanyāso dvirūpo 'bhidhayā vṛttyantareṇa ca | yatra bādhopanyāse bādhitānupanyāse vā 'bādhitā tasminneva vākye 'vijñātabādhetyarthaḥ | upanyāsetaraprakāreṇa jñātabādhakā bādhitā | bādhakāraṇokterbādhaparyavasānābhiprāyatvāt tadetaddarśayati—abādhitā bādhitā ceti ||
tatrātattve tattvarūpā 'bādhitā yathā—
‘mohavirame sarosaṃ thoratthaṇamaṇḍale suravahūṇam |
jeṇa karikumbhasambhāvaṇāi diṭṭhī pariṭṭhaviā || 108 ||’
[mohavirame saroṣaṃ sthūlastanamaṇḍale suravadhūnām |
yena karikumbhasaṃbhāvanayā dṛṣṭiḥ paristhāpitā ||]
﻿
